du'ang 'gro bar byed/ mtshon cha'i lam du'ang 'gro ngar byed/ rgya mtshor 'jug par yang 'jug par byed/ grang ba'i dus na'ang lhags pas gnod par byed/ dro ba'i dus na'ang tsha bas gnod par byed
cing/ bkres ba dang skom pa dag gis gnod bzhin du 'gro ba la'ang spro bar byed do/ longs spyod yongs su tshol ba na/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal bdag gis longs spyod yongs su btsal nas kyang/ rab
gi 'tsho ba dag gi phyir nye bar sgrub par byed pas/ dag yong dang/ brag je dag dang/ bkron pa dang sdug 'phongs pa dang/ slongs mo padag la sbyin pa sbyin rar ma bzod cing bud med rnams
zla kyi dbang du byas pa dang/ bud med rnams kyis shul 'og tu chud pa dang/ bud med rnams kyis bkol ba dang/ bud med rnams la byams pa de nyid kyis/ bud med de dag nyid gso ba'i phyir sbyin pa
sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims yang dag par len par mi nus shing/ da de la chags la/ bud med kyis smyos pa bzod par byed cing/ bud med kyis bsdigs pa dang/ bltas ba dang/ brgyad pa dag
kyang bzod par byed de/ de skyes par gyur kyang bud med kyis bsdigs pa dang du len cing mi dga' ba mad pa/ de'i ngor lta bar byed pa ni 'dod pa'i gzhis bud med kyi dbang du song ba yin te/
rgyal po chen po bud med la rten cing ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni/ skyes pa bud med la brkam zhing ngan skyugs kyi sgo la gdu ba dang/ mi gtsang ba la dga' ba dang/ shes bzhin med par
spyod pa'i skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon bzhi pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po skyon de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes pa ni/ 'dod pa rnams kyi dbang du 'gro ba yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dod pa rnams ni tshol ba na// rab tu myos pa ga la 'ad/ 'dod pa dman pa rnams ston pa// de ni gang gis bde bar 'gyur// skyes
bu dam pa ma yin pa'i// las rnams byed cing mi sdom la// 'dod pake'adod chags tshol byed pa// dedag rab nyams rlud kyang za//mi rnams gang dag mi mkhas pa// rnga mo bong bu'i/
chos spyod cing// bud med mthong na rab bsnyags 'a// ngan skyugs gnas la 'ga rnams bzhin// gang la byis nga gus bcas pa'i// 'dod rnams dring mi gtsung yang/ 'dod pa'i
skyon rnams mi mthong ba// sa yi steng na dmus long bzhin// gzugs kyi 'ching bas bcings pa rnams// 'dod pa'i 'du shes rab du 'jug/ byis pa 'dod rnams stan pa dag/
[g]da/ khyi dang wa rnams ji bzhin no/ sgra dri re dang reg rnams kyis// gang la so so'i skye bo rnams// byis pa 'khor bar yongs 'khor bar// spru'u rnams phur la btags pa bzhin// byis
pamatshig khebs pa rnams/ mun pa'i phung nge sa bsgribs gyur cing// bud med rnams la chags pani/ mi gtsang gnas la khwa bzhin no// gang gis ngan 'gror rab 'jug pa// da ni bdud kyi phyed yul yin/
romyong 'du shes chags gyur pa// ngan skyogs gnas la srin bu bzhin// bsad pa'i gshed ma rnams kyis// ji ltar mi zhig bor ba ltar// shasan thar pa 'thob 'gyur zhing// bud med dbang du 'gro
tsha mi 'gyur// 'dod pa bud med lta byed pa'i// kun tu sbyor las 'jigs pa skya// byis pa mtshan bar mdzan pa rnams// 'dod pa'i sred pas rab tu 'phel// sos ka'i dus mi zhig ni// dgon pa
nangor song gyur nas// byis pas lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs na// sgom pa phyir zhing rab skya ltar// de bzhin bden pa ma mthong ba// byis pa rmongs pas 'tsho ba rnams// 'din phyir zhing bud med la//
'ded pa'i srod pabartan par 'gyur// ji ltar mi lus mdzacan la// srogachags rnams ni bro ba ltar// 'dod btapa so so'i skye bo rnams// de bzhin bud med rnams kyis zos// mi gtsang bum pa
khra bo zhig/ kha dog ldan par snang mod kyi/ nang na ha' hala'i dug/ drag po chen po yod pa ltar// de bzhin bud med brgyan pa dag/ gang dang gongan sbyang ba yang// gnyis dang phyi sas gang ba yi//
rgyal pa rlung gis bkang ba bzhin// 'brumar gyisani bdar pa'i mtshon// gos kyis dkris ra ji bzhin du// dbazhin bud med brgyan pa yang// ral gri gling pa g.yogs pa bzhin// ji ltar ra dong gang gyur/
la// du bamad cing 'bar ldan ltar// bud me dad bzhin me 'dra zhing// srin bu gtum po bzhin du g.yo// sreg pa ribaskal pa 'dir byung na// sakun tu 'bar 'gyur la/ dartswa dngaga' ba 'jig gyu ra

zhing// chu klung dag kyang bskalas par 'gyur// 'byung ba chen po'i gnas gyurapa// rgyam ts+tshaya ngani skam gyur zhing// ri bo chen po rnams brag la// da bzhin lhun po 'ang 'jig par 'gyur/ rgyal chen 'byung
po'adzin pa yi// sa 'di'ang rnam par 'jig 'gyur zhing// drag chen rnams ni 'jigs 'gyur yang// skyob par byed pa yod ma yin// ji ltar ma yis rir bcas dang// rgya mtshor bcas pa spong pa ltar/

dbazhin bud mdam 'dra sta// gtum zhing skyes bu g.yo bar byed// snabs dang mchilam kha chu dang// klad rgyas rdul ba'i klad pa dang// lus las dring 'dzag de la// byis pa rnams ni sbyang chu ba[â€¦ , ]/
kha sgorus pas gang ba dang// sha dang pags la sogs bsags shing// da bzhin lus ni 'bras 'dra ste// dring smad par bya ba yin/ mi gtsang sna tshogs gang ba dang/ 'bras ni smin drur kum
ltar/ de ltar lus 'di mi gtsang ba// sna tshogs rnams kyi snod yin no// lo na gtam mtshar pa dang// globs gang zhing mkhal ma dang// khrag dang mkhris pas gang gyur/ kudirgyus[']kyis[']ni
@#// klad pa gang// khong ba'i nang na srin po'i rigs// brgyad khri po dag gnas gyur kyang// gtamug dra bas bsgribs pa yi// byis pa rnams kyis mthong ngo// rmasgo dgu nas rtag tu
ni/ mi gtsang la pazagakhyur kyang// smra ba dag dang lta ba la// bus pa rnams ni mtshan mar 'dzin// gang zhig kun gyis spyad pa'i ma la// chags pa rnams kyis phyisami shes// mi gtsang spyod yul
byis pa rnams// snabs dang ma 'i ma the bar byed// smad par 'os lugs byed pa// sbyong ba rnams kyis rma mthong bzhin/ mchan khung dag nas rdul 'dzag cing// smad pa'i drini 'byung bar
'tsha gyur// byis pa sdug bsngal chags byed pa// de dag bdag la gnod phyir g.yos// da nimyur du 'phongs ragyur te// 1 rnams chu nas bton pa bzhin// 'jigs rung lag nam blon sbugs kyis//
ji ltar mi shig gtsos po ltar/ mtshon 'dra'i bud med sdig can gyis// 'dod chags rnams de bzhin no// rnam rgyal lag rna mtshon thogs pas// ji ltar rgyal po gtsos pa ltar// 'dod chags
dang 'dra ba yis// 'dod la chags rnams de bzhin sreg/ shin pa'i gnas li rnams ltar// myung bar 'du shes byis pa rnams/ ji ltar sgra yis sreg pa ltar// myur du sdug bsngal byung bar 'gyur/
rang gis las kyi nyes pa yis// de la skyob pa med pa ltar// de bzhin bdag nyid nyes pa yis// sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro/ de dag sangs rgyas tshes spangs nas// budamada rnams kyi rnagal

rnyan/ sems ni rel chags gyur pa// de yis ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// ji ltar spre'u zhig shing las ni// shing gzhan du ni rgya ba'i tshe// dani gnas dar gtsos gyur na// de nyid du ni sdug bsngal gyur//
dbazhin 'dod la brkam pa dang// sdug bsngal 'dod chags stanapa dang// gti mugargyal thogs pa rnams// dus ni yang dang yang du 'da'// mi bkren rnapas nai gos la shing la// rab tu btsugasanas
'phyang ba ltar// de bzhin 'dod la chags pa rnams// shal ma la'i ni mtho la 'phyang// lta' men sran sda'u dang gre'u// lcagasaM grangs rnams su blugs nas kyang// mes ni rab tu bsregs pan//
dbu bar bcas shing khol ba ltar// de bzhin dge ba ma mthong zhing// 'dod la chags pa'i rgyu ba rnams// shin s ngan song 'gro 'gyur zhing// lcags grangs rnams su btso bar 'gyur// mi rnams
gang dag sdig byed pa'i// sems can sdig pa rnams kyi gnas// thangasanibye ba drug cu dang// gzhan yang bzhi po dag yin no// zangs ni so so ra re la// tshad ni dmigs su yod min zhing// ma yi
phung por ldan rnams su// bskal pa du mar btso bar 'gyur/ kha cig brangs rnams de dag tu// rang gi las kyisabaskal brgya 'am// nyis brgya sum brgya tsha bar 'tshad// yang na bzhi brgyar btso bar
'gyur// phra skam rnon po rnams kyisan// bsrung zhing yang dang yang bstugs pas// de dag shani yod mi na zhing// dung ltar dkar ba rnams su 'gyur// lcags kyi gneng par 'dug nas ni// btu/
tsha zhing 'drenapa med// shi zhing shizhing skye 'gyur te// rang gi las kyis gnas par gyur// gang tshe dmyal ba'i srungs rnams kyis// ngan pa'i mi rnams de dag ni// gtun la/
sogs pas brdungs pa sani// sha rkang rus pa phye mar 'gyur// de yi tshon de dag la// shin tu grang ba'i rlung yang ldang// des ni dmyalaM ba'i sems can rnams// sdug bsngal gyur pa de las 'tsho//
mi rnams gang dge sdig byed pa// gtun bu drag po rnams kyis 'dzoms// stare rnams kyis gshog pa dang// de bzhin kus shing gzugs par 'gyur// mi rnam sa gong dag sdig byed pa'i// sems/
can rnams kyi lus la ni// lcags mdung rtse mo bzhi pa dang// rtse gsum pa dang rtse lnga 'bab/ ya rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// ralakri'i/ chucan khu rnams kyis// mgo dang klad pa gtogs 'gyur
zhing wa dang spyang kis zos par gyur// rnams gang dag sdig byed nga/ ngan skyugs rul pa dri nga zhing// kun gyis smad par ltungagyur la// spyake'i chu klung rnams su ltung// mi rnams gang dag

sdig byed pa// rab tu tsha bar srog 'gyur zhing// du 'bod dang ni ngu 'bod gyi// thig nag tshulang sreg par 'gyur/ mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// thigo nag tu ni skyes nas kyang// yang dang yang du ma mur
dang// sa gri'i chu klung rnams su ltung// gang tshe lcags kyi zangs por// mi rnams de dag 'tshed pa na// khyi rnams kyis ni bgatsos gyur nas// dag bdab tshol bar byed// mi rnams gang dag sdog
byed pa/ dmal badrag po chen por ni/ klung nas dpung gnyen yod min zhing// lcags kyi thu lum ze bar 'gyur// mi rnams sdig pa byed pa dag/ lcags las grub pa'i brag chen dang/ mi sdug ri bo rnams/

kyisani// de'i tshe kun nas lus 'joms byed// de ni rang gis las byas pa'i// 'bras bu de 'dra thob gyur cing// de yis tshor ba myong ba na// de la skyob pa 'ga' yang med// ji snyed na pa thamasacad ni//

bdag gis mdun do 'ga' yang med// de ni mgonamed bdag gcig pu// sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar byed// gang dag bde phyir don min par// sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang// tha ma de dag de ring+gani/
rnam par grol pa'i mthu yang med// gang dag bad phyir dod min par// sngan chad nyes par sad byas kyang// bu dang bu mo chung ma rnams// de ring bdag la 'grol mi nus// gang dag bde phyir don min par//

sngan chad nyes pa spyad byas kyang// mdza' bshes tadu de dag kun// rnam par grol bar yong mi nus// gang dag bde phyir don min par// sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang// bdag gi rtsa lagade dag kun//
de ring sgrol bar mi nus so// 'dod pa dman pa rnams ston cing// dman pa'i chos rnams bsten nas ni// nyes pa'i las rnams byed pa dag/ de yis ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// shes thab 'chal pa mnar
med par// song nas sdug bsngal tshor ba myong// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bud med dag/ phyis 'dra ltar dman par bsgrags// de phyir dman pa rnams dang ni// dman pa'i bud me da rnams bston pa//
byis pa don phyi sa yi// rkyal pa bzung nas gnas pa yin// ci 'dra'i las ni byed pa ltar// de 'dra'i 'bras bu 'thob 'gyur te// rgyal po yi ni chad pa dang// sdug bsngal bcib dang
myong bar 'gyur// bud med gzhi las skyes pa yang// bsad dang bcing ba myong 'gyur zhing// dmyal srungs rnams kyis bsreg pa dang// nges par 'chi ba'ang myong bar 'gyur// bud med rnams la brkam pa yi//
blongan de dag bde mi 'gyur// gsalasheng mthon pa rnams sunI/ btsugs shing chur yang bcug par 'gyur/ sa yi sarakar bcug nas ni// dengazhin ral gris gdab par 'gyur/ de 'dra ba dag thes nas
de dag ya chad bdama'agyur// rmongs pa bud med lhan cig tu// yang dang yang du 'ad 'ja byed// sdug bsnga la 'dod pa rnams ston cing// smad pa rnams kyang bar byed// rmongs pa rnams kyis ches thes/
nas// dag bar gsungs shes rjod byed kyang// de sems bud med phyi bzhin song/ byibalani byi la bzhin/ rgyal bas gsungs pa thos gyur nas// su da tsam zhige ni yid byung yang// ra la hula'i dug 'du

ba'i 'dod chagasakyis ni dpang 'khrug/ ji ltar phagani yud tsam zhig/ sngangasashing skrag pa byung gyur kyang// des ni phyi sa ma thong ban// chags pa skyed par byed pa ltar// da bzhin bya'i pa bde 'dod/
rnams// rgyal ba'i bstan pas nags nas ni// 'dod pa dman pa rnams stan pa// desani ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dod pa rnams la chags myos nas// shin tu sdig pa'i las byas shing// tshul
khrims can dag bsus byas nas// phyis nin 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// shes rab can gyis dal rnyed cing// de 'dra'i chos ni thos gyur nas// 'dod kun sangs nas 'di la ni// mkhas ra mngon byung rab byung
de rgyal po chen po skyes pa 'ded pa la rten pa rnams kyi skyonani do dag yin te/ 'dod pa'i gzhi dang/ 'dod nga 'i rgyudang/ 'dod pa la lhag par zhan pa rnams// sems can dangul

ba pa rnams kyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ rgyal po chen po da lta bas na/ khyod kyis rtag par rgyun du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// khyod kyis lus su gtogs pa'i sems rjes su dran pa/
bsgom par bya'o// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis// bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la de lta de ltar chos ston par mdzad do/ tshes bstan pa des bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
dga' ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' bathob par gyur to/// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad
ji tsam du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gangshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skyes pa dang bud med rnams kyi skyon bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar da dag bka' stsal cing legs
par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang// chos dang/ dag slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su man+ti/ mtshon cha spangasashing/ dbyug pa sngangs la//
ngo tsha mchis shing/ srog chags 'byung po thams cad la snying rtse bar zhugs pa lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dag bsnyen dugazung du gsol/
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'astsal nas/ bdasa'i rgyal po 'char byed dang/ dge slong de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri gra bcas
ba'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ btsem ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i tshes kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ bad sa'i rgyal
ngo bar byed kyis zhus pa'i 'a zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po dze nam tra dang/ su len dra bo ng+hadeng/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes
snga la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ bam po gcig oka nyis brgya/ kA'aphags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'a' stong
phrag brgyupa las/ le'u sumacu pa sta/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa/ bam po phyedade//@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sa ma ti dwarikAkhri ts+tshan
ma mahAyAn sa tA/ bod skadadu/ 'phags pa bu mol+le gros bzang mos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i mi la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' khri'i
byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tubazhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ khyim bdag drag shul can gyi bu mo blo gros bzang mo zhes
bya ba btsas nas lo brgyad len pa 'dra ba/ gzugs ba brang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa// kha dog babrang po rgyas pa mtshog dang ldan// sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhagapar bya ba byas pa/ ka

ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa// sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkor byas pa/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa zhig/
'dug pa de 'khor dang bcas par bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba rang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
ma bskor btus nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gal te skabs phye bdag gisani// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rkang gnyis mtsheg/ 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa la// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gapazhu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yid l ci 'dod thams cad ni// bumo khyod kyis dri bgyis//
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun// ci 'dra khyod la bstan par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das la su ma blo grab brang mosags su bcad de gsol pa//
gangagis sun mdzes par 'gyur// gang gis na ni tsha ba dang// mi phyed 'khor dang ldan par gyur// thub pas 'di bdag la gsungs// chos kyi rgyal po nas ni// gang gis rdzus te skye 'gyur
wA zhing/ 'dab ma stong ldan pa la/ mgi par yang ni gda' ba drang// zhing rnams byeb dpag yas par// sangs rgyas phyag bgyir mtshib ya// rdzu 'phrul pha rol phyin gyur ba'i/ grod pa rgyal
bas lung bstan gsol/ dgu zla mamachis gangagis 'gyur// tshag kyang btsun par 'gyur ba dang/ phas kyi sgrib pa mamachis dang// bdud kyi lasakun mamachis dang// 'chi ba'i dus ni bgyid pan//
mngon sumasangs rgyas mthong pa dang// de las tshes kyang nyan pa dang// sdug bsngalatshor ba myong mi 'gyur// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyisaM/ bumo bgres
bzang mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo khyed kyis de bzhinagshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar soms pa legs so legasaso// bu mo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas
bshad de// bu mo blo gros bzang mos/ bcom ldan 'das 'gas so zhes gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' su 2to//
bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan n mdzes par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ than dgra la'ang khri bar mi byed pa dang/ masapala gnas pa dang/ chos 'ded pa dang/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpar chos bzhi po da dag dang ldan na/ mdzos par 'gyur ro// de la 'disad ces bya ste/ gnod pa'i rtsa ba khro ba red/
ma byed// byams la gnas par byed dang tshes 'dod dang// dbazhin gshegs pa'i snyakazugs byas na ni// mdzes pa 'gyur te blta bar 'os pa yin// bum byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang
ldan na/ nor che bar 'gyur ta/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dus su sbyin padong/ 'gyod pa med par sbyin pa dang/ yid du 'ong ba sbyin pa dang/ rnam par smin pa 'a re ba med par smin pa lta
bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na nor che bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dus subyin dang 'gyod pa mad pa dang// yid 'ong sbyin dang rnag sminam rer// dpa'
bo rnams ni las 'di byas pa na// rtag tu las byed chen po thob pa yin// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' tshos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'khe mi phyed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta sku/
phra ma'i tshig sbyangs pa dang/ sems can log par lta ba rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'jog par byed pa dang/ dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i tshodam pa'i chos srung ba dang//
sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag bar 'adzan du 'jug cing 'jog par byed pa na// bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i tshos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ 'khor
mi phyed par 'gyur// de la 'di skad ces bya// phra ma de bzhin log par ltakha song// dam chos 'jig pa'i tshon srung bar byed// sems can byang chub yang dag 'dzan 'jugan// 'khor rnams
mi phyed phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad du/ ni po chen po'i pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/
bzhi gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ phyoma'am/ me tog ut+pa la 'am/ kumu da ma/ pad+ma dkar pos lag pa bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
mchod rten la 'bul ba dang/ gzhan dag la'ang gnod sems mi skyod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa byed du 'jug pa dang/ sas rgyas kyi byung
chub la des pa rgya bar mos pa sdu/ pu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi po dadag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyithod du/ rin po che chen po'i pad+ma lasardzus te skyabar
'gyur ro// dal 'di skad cesaMbya ste/ phyem me tog bkang ste 'bul ba dang// gnod sems spong zhing skukazugs byed pa dang// mos pa rgya chen la ni gnas byed na// rgyal ba dag gi zad ru/
ba sems dpa' tshes bzhi dang ldan n rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhin gnas sangs rgya sakyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan dgagidag

ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad mi byed pa dang/ gzhan dag chesanyan pa la bar chad mi byed pa dang/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten drag la mar me 'bul ba dang/ ting nge 'dzan sgom pa ste bumo byang chub sam/

dpa' tshes bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyus kyi shing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gro bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skadatses bya ste/ dag bdag gi bar chad mi byed dang// gzhan gyi ches
gtan dag lami smod dang rgyalaba'imachod rten dag lam la 'bul// ting 'dzin bsgoms pas da ni zhing da khu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dgra blo med par 'gyur te//
bzhi gang zhen 'dilta ste/ g.yo mad par dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la rten pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba la sir sna mi byed pa dang/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa la dga' ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnamA
kyi bya ba dang/ gnas nga thams cad la khong khro ba ma byed cing/ mi snyan pa mi sgrogs pa ste/ bumo byang chub sems dang/ chos bzhi bo de dag dang ldan na/ dgra zlamed par 'gyur ro// de la 'di
skad ces bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la dgayo med// gzhan gyi rnyed pa dga' zhing ser sna med// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la mi smodan// rtag tu dgra zla med par spyod par 'gyur//
bum byang chub sems dpa' tshos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshig btsun par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhin/ 'di la// ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang/ mdza' bo dag la yod pa'i/

gang bzhin mi 'chab pa dang/ klan ka mitshol bar chos nyan par ng/ gzhan tshes lcab dag la 'phya sgyu mi byed pa ste/ bumo byang chub sems dpa' tshos bzhi po de dgadang ldan na/ tshig btsun par 'gyur 'od/

t+tA dal 'di skad ces bya ste/ rjeskad smos pa de bzhin byed pa dang// mdza' la yod pa'i rang bzhin mi 'chab cing// klan ka mitsholachesan nabyed na// 'jigs pa me da cing tshig kyang btsun par 'gyur// bu
kaM mo byang chub sems dpa' tshes bzhi dang ldan/ las kyi sgrib pa med par 'gyur zhing yongs su dag pa'i ngamyur du rtogs par gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lhag pa'i bsam pa bsgrubs pas
sdom pa gsum yang dgapa 'an pa dang/ mdo sde zab mo rnams cha sbyong ba dang/ soms dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dang 'al thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'du shes bskyod pa dang/ sems can
cad 'byams pa bsgom pa ste/ bumo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhipa dudag dang ldan na/ las kyi sgrib pa med par 'gyur zhung yongs su dag pa'i ng myur du rtogs par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skadatses
lho bya ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas sdom pa gsum l gnas// mdo sde zab mo rnams la rtag tu mos// sangs rgyas sras 'thams cad makhyen ltar lta// sems can rnams la byams pas las dag gyur
bumo byang chub sems dpa' sa bzhi dang ldan/ bdud kyi las med par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dubasgom pa dang/ brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang/ sangs
rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa dang/ dgaba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba ste/ bumo byang chub sems dpa' tshes bzhi pa da dgadang ldan na/ bdud kyi las med par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya sU//
tshes rnams la ni chos kyi tshul rtogs la// brtson 'grus gnas shing sangs rgyas rjes su dran// yongs su bsngo zhing bshags dang phyag 'tshal ba// del bdud kyis klags nirIdam 'gyur/ bu mo khyadachub
sams dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bar pa'i dus kyi tsho mdun dusangs rgyas bzhugs shing/ de las chos kyang nyan la sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur te/ bzhi gapan na/ 'di lta sta/ gzhan
dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ mos pa mang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa bkod pa sna tshogs tu bar sgrub pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum mchod pa la brtson pa ste/

bu mo byang chub sems dpa' tshos bzhi pa da ngag dang ldan na/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tsha mdun du sangs rgyas bzhugs shing/ de las tshos kyang nyin la sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad
ces bya ste/ de ni gzhan gyi bsam pa rdzogs byed cing// mos pa dang ni sbyin pa rgya che ba// mkhas pa de ni rtag tu sbyin pa ra byed// de phyir de mdun de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs// de skad ces bka'
bcom ldan 'das la/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos 'di skadartser gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji skad
bcas pa 'di dag la bdag gisakhaslab par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis bzhi pa bcu po ji skad du bka' stsal pa 'di dag las chos gcig gcig m sbyadana'ang/ bdag gis dbazhin
gshegs pa'i sku bsdus par gyur cig/ de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bu mo blo gros bzang mo la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod
bani nyams 'og tu chudaparadag la na/ khyed la de lta bu yang dag par len par byed na/ ci byed kyis sems la dbang thob bam/ de skad ces smras nas/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos/ tshe dang ldan
pa mo na ragal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshagi gang gis bdag gis chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed ra ra gyur ba'i bden
zla pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig des stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ lha'i mi tog gi char 'bab par gyuracig ma dkrol bar yang sil snyan gyi sgra byung bar
gyur cig ces byas so// de nas bumo blo gros bzang mos de ltar b den pa'i byin gyis brlabs byas ma thagatu/ de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'danamal drug tu g.yos
te/ lha'i ma tog gichar bab par gyur cing/ mdakrol bar lha'i sil snyan gyi sgrung byung bar gyur te// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig gang gis de ltar de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ji lta ba de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bdag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag la bdud
(kyang byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ ngan song rnams kyi ming yang med pa dang/ bud med kyi skyon rnams med par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig des khar 'di gser gyi kha dog can du gyur
ti/ bu mo blogres bzang mos de skad ces sa ma thag tu de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de gser gyi kha dog can du gyurato// de nas tsho dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi
bu chen po stan las langs te// chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal la// de nas
'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur bas/ bu mo blo gros bzang mo la 'daskad ces sas so// blo gros bzang mo khyod tshes gal gnas te/ bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di byas/ blo gros bzang mos
wu'u/ sa pa/ 'jam dpalatshos kyi dbyis ni gnas pa ma mchis pas/ del gnas par mi nus te/ dil dri ba mamachis so// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ blo gros bcad// lcas pa/ 'jamadabalachas
mo byang chub ces bya ba 'dikangagi tshig bla dgas yin/ blo gros bzangamosasnas pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub ces bgyi ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshos kyi tshig bla dgas so// 'jam dpal gyis smras
ba/ blo gros bzang mo 'di ltar byang chub sems dpalazhes bya ba 'digangag tshige bla dgas yani/ blo gros bzang mos sbas pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba ni nam mkha'adang
mnyam pa nyid kyi ches kyi tshig bla dgas so// rajam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo kras bzang mo ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i ng byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa mdzad dam/ blo kres ba zang mos sas pa/ 'jam

dpal dpar na smig rgyu dang brag chasabyang chub kyi phyir spyad pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas kyang byang chub kyi phyir spyad do// 'jamadapal gyis sbas pa/ blo gros bzang po khyod kyis ci las bsag/
te de skad ces smras/ blo gros bzang mos sas pa/ 'jam dpal 'di la chos 'ga' la'ang bsam pa 'am/ bsam pam lags pa ma mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ blo gros/
bzang mo bsam pa dolta bu yin du zin na/ byis pa thams cad kyang byang chub tu 'gyur ro// blo grosabazang mos smras pa// 'jam dpal 'di ji sum du dgos/ byis pa rnams kyang gzhan l/
mkhas pa rnams kyang gzhan te/ byang chub kyang gzhan par gzigs sam/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul du 'di ni dbyis gcig palags te/ blang ba ma mchib/
shing der ba ma mchis la so btags pa ma mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ blo gros bzang mos bshad pa 'di'i don shes pa ji snyed cig yod/ blo gros bzang mos sas pa/ 'jam
dpa la bshad pa 'di'i don 'tshal pa ni skyag sngal pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba ji snyed mchis pa de sud do// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ blo gros bzang mo sul pa nyid kyang med na/ de'i
sems dang sems las byung ba lta ga la yodo/ blo gros bzang mos sas pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings nimachis pa'i ng ma lags/ mamachis pa'i ng ma lags te/ de bzhin gshegA
pa'i ng de dang 'dra'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bu mo blo gros bzangamo 'di ni zang
mo'i bzedapa dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin ne// ji skad snas pa bzhin te/ bumo blo kris bzang mo yang dag par
rdzo gas pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas/ bskal pa sum cu len pa'i 'og tu gdod ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de// khyed kyang bu mo blo gros bzang
mo 'di nyid kyis mi skyo ba'i tshes la zhugs par byas so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bu mo blo gros bsrang mol phyag byas nas/
gi 'di skad du bdag gis slob dpon kun rang po zhig nam thang ngo zhes kyang smras so// blo grosabazangamos smras pa/ 'jam dpalag rtog go/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ mi skyo ba'i tshes la bzod bzhi rnam
b+h+yA par mi rtag pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ ci'i phyir slob dpon gyis budang da kyilus las de dung bsgyur/ blo gros bzangamos smras pa// 'jam dang la'adi ni bud med de// 'dan skyes/
pa'o zhes bya ba de ni dmigs pa ste/ 'on kyang khyod kyis the tshom med pa bya'o// bden pa gang gis bdagam 'ongs pa'i dus na/ debazhi gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas
rgyas su 'gyur ba'i bden pa des bdag skyes par gyur cig/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'iyod la/ de'i bud med kyi dngos po mi snang bar gyur nas skyes par red de/
chos gos ngur smig gyonanas/ des 'di skad du bden pa gang gis bdag gis byang chub thob pa na/ dge slong tshur shog ces byas pas rab tu byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der
bdud kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ ngan songagi ming yang med pa dang/ bud medakyi skyon rnams kyang med par 'gyurab 'i bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig des bdag dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas/

lo sum cu len pa'i spyod lam ci 'dra ba de lta bur gyur cig ces byas so// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang pos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la/ de dge slongakhasnyen pa rdzogs gsanas la/
sum cu len pa'i spyod lam ci 'drab de lta bu gyur to// 'jam dpal bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gisangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can rnams kyi lus gsar gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur ba
dang/ bsams ngos bza' ba dang btung ba 'grub par 'gyur te/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang/ yos su spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing

de na ngan song gsum yongs su sbyangs par 'gyur bdang/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa dang/ rin po che'i drakhas yongs su bskor cing rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+madag gis rgyas la steng rin po che'i
bla re bres te/ 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci 'dab kho na dmanyam zhing ma lhag pa de lta bur 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig des 'khor 'di gser gyi kha dogacan du gyur cig ces byas
so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang pos tshig de skad sus ma thag tu de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan nga'i 'khor da gser gyi kha dog can du gyur to/ gad nasas bla'i lca rnams
kyilha'i lus kyis gcig nas gcig tu sgra bsgrags shi skad kyis go bar byas te/ kyem byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po blogres bzang po byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
bkod pan de lta bur 'gyur ro zhes chedadu brjod pa 'di cad du brjod de/ dunas bcom ldan 'das kyis// 'jam dpal gzhonanur gyur ba la 'a stsa 'a ba/
'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs ra/ 'jig
rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha la sbyar ba/ ban med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sasargyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan rin chen dpal kyi snying po zhu bya bar 'jig rten du 'byungabar
'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam gras 'di bka' stsal pan/ srog chags bye ba phrag sum cu blo namadapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa nyid la yang dag par
gnas par gyur te/ lha bye ba phrag brgyad cu ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag ge/ srog chags brgyad stong gis ni ya shas mngon par rtogs par gyur te/
byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dag slong byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldeg par 'dod pa lnga stong tsam yang/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po'i lhag pa'i bsam partogs/
shing dge ba'i rtsa ba'i che ba nyida mthong nas/ de dag rang rang gi bla gos bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa blanamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
'babasngos nas tshig 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di blanamed pa la/nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces smras so// dge slong de dag gis dge ba'i
rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos ma thag tu bskalapa dgu bcu'i 'khor ba bstsal te dor nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
ldog par gnas pa gyur to// de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan te/ 'jam dpal dge slong 'di gni bsal pa cu gnyis n/ bskal pa drim med
ba'i 'od tsas bya ba la/ dbazhin gshegs pa bzod par dka' ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rtan gyi khams 'od zer can du bskal pa gcig la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub man pa rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i rgyan ces bya bar thams cad mang 'thunapa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
'jam dpal de ltar natshes kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ nyan thos rnams l rdzu 'phrul chen po byed pa yin no// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu
'am rigasakyi bu mo byang chub 'dodapagagis bskal pa stong gi bar du thabs mkhas pa dam bral bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dal/ gang gisachos kyi rnam gras 'di brisanas zla kha
phyed kyi bar du lan re bklags na/ bsod nams kyi phung po snga masani/ bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang mi phod/ stong gi cha dang/ brgya stong gi cha dang/
byeb brgya stong gi tshe dang/ grangs dang/ dpe dang/ rgyur yang mi bzod do// 'jam dpal de bas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la gtad kyis/ khyed mthun par gyis lasngon gyi byang chub sems
dang 'i smon lam sa byung ba'i mdo 'di lta bu 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dusazung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig tshongs shig shod cig/ lhogs shig/ ston cig/ gzhan dag la rgya rarab tu
ston cig/ 'dzam dpaMl dparan 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dza sridadu gnas pa de srid du rin po che sna bdunamed par mi 'gyur la/ 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po shin rin po chasna bdun med par/

( 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di 'jig rten na ji srid du spyod pa de srid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che sna bdun dang/ byang chub kyi
phyogasakyi tshes kyi tshul thams cad mad par mi 'gyur la// chos kyi rnam gras 'di lta bu 'di med par gyur na/ dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bas namado sde rin pa cha 'di lta bu
'di yi ger bri ba dang/ lung 'bogs pa dang/ bcang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ gzhan dag la rgyatshor rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ byang ba sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis brtson
ka wa 'grus brtsam par bya'o// 'di ni pa'i rjes su bstan pa yin no// phyis 'gyod par gyur ta2/ 'din rigs kyi bu ma/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub 'dod pa la nges bstan pa yin no//
btsam ldan 'das kyis de skad co bka' stsa la nas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i takhe de dang/ 3dang/
ma dang/ lha ma pa na dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsags pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam
grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu pa rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tadang/ su ra da
bo d+hidang/ zhuchen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa///rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba pakod pa
lAnanAm sUtra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gang ga mtshog gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub gnas dang 'thams cad la phyag 'tsha' la
skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodon/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/
chen pos nyan yodan/ dgabasnyan ma gang ga'i mgaces bya ba zhig gnas so// de nas dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchogamanyan yod nas byung nas// rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/
mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal taphyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang dbam
wA ldan 'das kyi sa ma khyen bzhin du dge bsnyan ma gang ga'i mtshog la/ gang ga'i mchog khyod da gzod gang nasa'os/ shes snas/ gang ga'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig
gis stsal pa la sus te/ khyod da gzed ba/n gnas 'ongs/shas de skad bgyis na/ ji skad lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang ga'i mchog sprul
pa la ni 'grengab med/ 'dug pa med/ nyal ba med/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba mad/ 'chi 'pho med/ skye ba mad na 'di nas 'ongs so nas de ci zhig ston par 'gyur/ gang ga'i mchog gis/
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu ma 'a/gas sam/ bka' stsal pa/ gang ga'i mchog de bzhinano// gnod pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos/
thams cad sprul pa lta bu legasan/ gang ga'i mchog khyod da bzed gang nas 'ongs zhes pa'i smad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang ga'imatshog sprul pa ni ngan song du
ma 'gro/ mtho sa sumi 'gro/ da ngas su mun las 'das pa mi gre na/ gang ga'i gatshog kyang ngan song du mi 'gro/ mtho ris sumi 'gro/yongs sumyungan las 'das pa'i m 'gro ma/
gang ga'i mtshog gis gso pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis dgabasten na gang ga'i mchog sprul pa'i rang bzhin las zhan 'gas par mthong nani/ dgabastanam gang ga'imartog ngan song
dumachi ba rom/ mtho ris su mchi ba 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mib ma 'gas so/zhas bdag sprul pa dang bstun du'ang mi rung 'gas na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni dge
bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchog sprul pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan 'gas par ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar b dog gis ma mthong na/ dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchog ngan song du mchi ba 'am/
mtho ris su mchi ba 'am/ u0f7c nga su mya ngan las 'das par mchib zhas ji skad bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags kyis kyang/ g.yo ba dang/ rlom sems dang/ bskyod pa dang/
spros pamachis na/ 'di snyam du bdag ngan song du 'gro ba 'am/ mtho ris su 'gro ba 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'o snyam du sems lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las
'das pa'i dbyings nams kyang ngan song du mchi ba 'am/ mtho ris sumachi ba 'am// yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba lags ti/ bcom ldan 'das dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mtsheg
kyang de lta bu'i dbyings can 'gas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang ga'i mchog khyod ci yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par ma zhugs sam/
gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das su zhig gis mi skyo barmas te/ khyod yongasasumyungan las 'das pa 'a ma zhugs sam zhes de skad bgyis na/ jiskad lan 'debs par 'gyur logs//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang ga'a mchog mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshig bla dgas yan na/ de ci zhig lan 'debs par 'gyur/ gang ga'i mchog gis gsol
ba/ bcom ldan 'dus ci chos thams cad myan las 'das pa dang mtshungs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa// gang ga'i mchog de de bzhin te/ tshes thams cad nimya ngan las 'das pa dang
mtshungs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs pa lags na/ gang ga'i mchog khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par
! ma zhugs sam zhes da ci zhig sbasta/ bcom ldan 'das su zhig gis stsal pa la smras te/ khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das par yang dag bar ma zhugs sam zhes de skadabagyis na/ ji skad
lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapho/ gang ga'i mchog drib 'di ni dmigs pa nod pa'o// gsol pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das kyis dmigs pa dang
bcas pa'i sla ba smos gas sam/ bka' stsal pa// gang ga'i mchog dri ba 'di ni dmigs pa medayod kyi/ 'on kyang 'khor 'di na rigs kyi bu ma/ rigs kyi bu mo 'dul ba dag yod de/
da dag gi don chen por 'gyur bas dris so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ga'i mchog de bzhin gshegs pas ni tshes nyid ces pa'i ng mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas na/ gang de las byung ba'i
chos phangs su mya ngan las 'das pa gnas ra lta ga la zhig yod/ gsol pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyid ces bgyi ba'ang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/ de 2sa
byung ba'achos lta ga 'dra zhig mchis par gyur na/ btsam ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi srid du ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
gong ga'i mchog gang dmigs pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dag pa'i rtsa ba de ni gang gi tshe yang dag par sgrub pa'i tshe'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid mi 'do//
yigang gi tshayang dag par mi sgrub pa de'i tsho'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid mi 'dor ro/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis ma khyab pa la bsam kyis mi khyab pa zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad
du/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhas bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang ga'a mchogaches 'di ni sems pas thob pa bya ba ma yin te/
sems pas thob par bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di na samasanyid kyang mi dmigasan/ gangasams las rab tu byung ba'i tshes lta ga la yod//
gang ga'i mchog sems mi dmigs pa ni bsam gyis khyab pa'i rgyud ces bya'o// bsamakyis ma khyab pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de ni thob dang ma yin/ mngon par rtogs pa ma yin/ shes ba ma
pa/ rina mngon sum du byas pa ma yin te/ dan thob par bya ba ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byung ba ma yin no// da ci'i phyir zhin/ gang ga'i mchog 'di ltar de bzhi/
gshegs pas chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar nges par zugags su chud de/ gang ga'i mchog ches thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gnyen po med pa'o// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das
gal te chos thams cad nam mkha'adang mtshungs pa gnyen po ma mchis pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs shes btags pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/
rnam par shes pa zhes btags pa dang/ phung bo rnams dang/ khams rnams dang/ skye mched rnams dang/ rten cing 'brel papa'i byung ba dang/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ thag pa ma mni
pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba dang/ 'khor ba dang/ mya ngana'as 'das ra zhes btags pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang ga'i
mtshog 'di lta ste/ dpal na bdag bdag ces 'dogs kyang bdag gang yang mi dmigs pad bzhin du/ gang ga'i mtshog ngas gzugs shes btags te/ gzugs gang yang mi dmigs///
dab/ ngas tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam pa rags pa zhes btags to shum par nyis pa gang yang ni dmigs so/// phung po rnams dang/ khams rnams
dang/ skyon/da rnams dang/ rtan cing 'brel par 'byung pa dang/ brag pa dang bcas pa dang brag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba dang 'khor ba dang/
mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'ang ngas btags te/ mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang mi dmigs// gang ga'i mchog 'di lta sta/ dngangan smig rgyunams la ni chu yong yod dam dmigs/
so// gang ga'i mtsheg de bzhin du ngas gzugs/ shes bya ba btags kyang gzugs gang yang ni dmigs so// satshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa
zhes bya ba btags kyang ma par shes pa gang yang mi dmigs so// phung po rnams dang khams rnams dang/ skye mched rnams dang/ rten cing 'brel nga ro 'byung ba dang/ zag pa dang bcas
pa dang/ brag pa mad pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba dang/ 'khor ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba sa btags kyang/ don dam par n de dag thams
cad med cing mi dmigs so// gang ga'i mchog gang chos l mchog tu 'dzani pamed par tshas par spyad pa spyod pa de lta bu ni 'degs par gsungs pa'i tshes 'dul ba la tshas/
bar spyod pa la gnas pa yin no// gang ga'i mchog mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gnas la dmigasanas tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de dag gi tshangs par spyod pa de ni yongs su ma dag pa 'o zhes nga sma'o//

[% ]gang dag tshangs par spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa de dag ni zab mo rgyud chad pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di thos nas sngangs skrag par 'gyur te/ de dag skye ba dang/ rnab dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan
dang/ skye sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yi dam bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams las yongs sume 'grolato/ de dgan sdug bsngal gyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro zhes nga sla'o// gang
ga'i mtshogi da ltar bam/ nga 'das po'i phyi na'ang rung/ gang dag zab mo rgyud chad pa 'di lta bu'i tshe/ston pa de dag la/ migatiyug pa dag gsod pa'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur ti/ de ltar
mi gti mug pa de dag leg par zin nga sa bsad nga 'i zhesdang bskyod nas/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gang ga'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyud chad pa rgyud chad pa zhes bgyi
bci'i slad dun rgyud chad pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang ga'i mchog chos 'dini rgyud bcad pa 'am/ dbye ba ma/ rnam par gzhig po ma yin to/ de'i phyir rgyud
bcad pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud ces bya'o/ danas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe'adzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom/
ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dag dum 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang sur po dang/ dmar po dang dkar po dang btsadaka dang/ sham dang/ dngul gyi kha dog lta
bu dag kyang byun gnas / da dmag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bar byas te/ 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rtan gyi bar du mngon par byung ste//
slaphog nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor nub be/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsug
nas btsem ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thalamesbyar ba btudad 1 bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par
'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang 'gas/ rgyan gong 'gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' be ngas mngon par shes te/ sa phyogs 'di
nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa stong gis gang ga'o mtshog ces bya ba kho na'i dag bsnyan ma sha stag las brtsams te chos kyi rnam granga'adi bshad do// dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad ni rab tu byung nas/
phung po med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyis su yos su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'imang ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ kun dga'i tshes kyi rnam
grangs 'di dris med pa zhes bya ste/ 'di dri ma med pa zhes bya bar zug zhig/ sa kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na dag slong bdun brgya dang/ dgeslongam bzhi brgya len pa med par thag pa rnamA
las sems rnam par grol la// de nas 'ded pan spyod pa dang/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i mitog rnams dang/ tsan dan gyi lcam rnams mngon par sprul
te/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces 'di ltar grong khyer mnyan yod na dge bsnyan ma 'di lta bu gnas la/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig stsa'ang/ de'i lus l ba'o

yang mi 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar gang ga'i mchog 'di sngon kyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang/ yun ring po nas dge ba spyad pa dang/ yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad
pa dang/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa 'di ni ngomatshar to zhes smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin te/ 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba
byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa// yun ring du tshangs pa spyod pa ' gnas 'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchog/
dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lham yin dang/ drithar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkona mchog brtse gas pa chen
po'i tshes kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brkyang las/ 'phags pa gang ga'i mchog gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi
mkhan po dzin ma tra dang/ dAn shI la dang/ zhu chen gyiletsa ba banaya shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsang ba cad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ shAka bcu dang bcu'o//
#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yaasheka dad ta ka ra Nan mamahAyAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pamya ngan med kyis khyen pa lung bstanapa zheT
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpaM' thams cad la phyag 'tshal// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong thamasacad kyang gazungs
thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa bsgrubs pa la mkhas pa// tshes zab mo'i tshulal gnas pa/ stong pa nyid la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med
bal gnas pa/ smon pa med pa la gnasab/ mi dmigs pa'i chos la gnas pa// mi gnas par chos ston pa// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/
[% ]byung chub sems dapa' lhun po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' lcan po chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes lhun po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' na chen seng ge dang/ byang chub
gams dpa' seng ge blo gros dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rtag tu lag brkyang dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag bsgring dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson dang/
byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu 'dzum zhing rab tu dga' ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dbang po las 'das pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu gdung dang/ byang chub sems
g+ha dpa' rinachen sems dang/ byang chub sems dpa' lag narin chen dang/ byang chub sems dapa' 'gan rin chen thogs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rinetshan bkra ldan dang/ byang
! chub sems dpa' kha la sgyur dang/ byang chub sems dpa' kha lo sgyur ba chen po dang// byang chub sems dpa' bden pa la dga' ba dang/ byachub sems dpa' byams pa dang/
byang chub sems dpa' 'jamadapal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ skyes bu dam pa brgyad la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dang 'a bzang skyong dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas/
dang/ byang chub sems dpa' phug sbas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dbang po'ilha dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chu lha'i lha dang/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros yangs pa dang/
byang chub sems dpa' blo gros khyad par can dang/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'phel dang/ de'agrwa sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyud stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//
dunas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen pon gnas shing bzhugs pa la/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang/ rgyal po'i bka' la gtogs pa dang/ blonapo dang/
snachen po la gtogs pa dang/ zhang 'don gyi bu tsha dang/ zhabs drung na 'bod pa dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ khyim bdag rnams kyis bsti stang du byas//
blamar byas/ rimor byas/ mchod par byas te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong dums yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa 'di lta ste/ tshangs par spyod pa//
thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ thamar dge ba/ don bzang po// tshag 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa// yongs su rdzogs pa/ yos su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba rab tu ston
de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang/ tshedang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang/ tshodang ldan pa
rab 'byor dang/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang/ tshodang ldan pa bar 'khor dang/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang/ tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang/
tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba dang/ tshidang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang/ de dag dang gzhan yang nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po rnams snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ chos gos dang sham thabs bgos
nas/ lhung bzed thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// de nas nyan thosachen po de dag la po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por
mthar chags su bsod snyomasakyi phyir rgyu zhing/ mthar gyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar 'bod do// yang de'i tsho la/
po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang na bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa zhes bya ba btsas nas lo bcu gnyis len pa 'dra ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po/
zhi rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rkyal ba la lhag par bya babyas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sas rgyas brgya stongamang po la bsnyen bkur byas po/ bla na med pa'i byang chub
las phyir mi ldog pa de rang gi pha'i khang bzasan khri gsar kyi rkang pa can yod pa la 'jug par gyur to// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong nas khri de las ma
las te/ bsur yang mi 'gro/ phyag kyang mi byed/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan yeng me 'dang/ bsod sogs kyang ma 'bulakha kha rogs 'dug ga/ de nas rgyal po/
ma skyes dgras/ nyan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i pho brang du 'os zhes thos nas/ rang gyi khang bzasakyi snga gang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag la ratshog
tu sdug par 'dzin pas/ mngon par dga' zhing snyan mang bting po// rgyal po ma skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong bzhin du kha reg ste dug pa mthong
nas bume mu na med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bum 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya skyab
pa de'i nyan thos chen po ste/ che ba nyid kyi yon tan gyi tshosadapaldan pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjesasu thob ra// srid par
kun tu sbyorab/ yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa/ snying brtse ba can yin te/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i/
phyir/ bsod snyoms kyi phyi chu bar khyed kyis ma shes sam/ cin khyod kyis de dag mthong la/ mthong bzhin du khri las kyang me ljang/ bsu bar yang m khyed//
phyag kyang mi 'tshal/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms la'ang spyanam 'dren/ dad pa dang gus pa'i ng ma skyed par/ ci'i phyiram gus pa ston cing kha rog ste 'dug/ khyod kyis na
@# gyi dbang ci zhiga mthong/ de skad ces smras pa dang bumo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ rang gi pha rgyal po ma skyes dkral 'di skad ces smras so// yab 'di ji snyam du dgongs/ ci 'khor
los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rgyal phran la ltang ma/ bsur mchib nam yang gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bumo de nam yin no// bumos sa pa/ yab ci
lha'i dbang po brgya byin lhagazhan dag la ldang ngam/ bsur mchi 'am/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bumo de nim yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci mi badzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha gzhan dag
lasnang ngam/ bsur mchi 'am// rgyal pos stsas pa/ bu mo de nim yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci mtsho chen po mtshodang/ mtshe'u dung chuyig dang/ mtsho bran dang/
lteng ka dang khrom pa la phyag 'tshal ba gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgya29 pos sa sapa/ bu mo dani ma yin no// bumos smras pa/ yakha ciri'i rgyal po ri rab ri nag po
gzhan dag la 'dud pa ma/ phyag 'tshal ba gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo danam yin no// bumos smras pa yab ci tim dang/ zla ba dang/ skar
ma'i tshogs srin du mi khyer gyi 'od 'dedapa gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo danam yin no// bumos smras pa/ yab ci ri dgas kyirgyal bo seng ge wa la ldang ba
ma/ bsur mchib gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de nim yin na// bumos smras pa/ yab da bzhin dusu zhig blan med pa yang dag par rdzogasapa'i//
byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byams pachen po dang snying rje chen po'i seng ga'i sgra bsgrags la/ dman pa la mosopa'i nyan thos lta bur gyur pa/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen
bo dbul ba dag la dga' zhing sdang ba'am/ bsuramachib 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ bkur sti bgyid/ yab chos kyi rgyal po tshan po su zhig chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med ngang
bskyo'i tam/ skor bar bskyed pa na/ nyan thos dman pa/ zhan pa/ zham pa/ 'u tsho ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la dga' bas phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ 'dud par bgyid/ yab
lha'i bdag po lha'i dbang po lta bu su zhig rnam par dag pa'i lha'i bdag po rin du gterab na/ dge ba chung ba'i lha lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ ldang
nyu/ ba 'am/ bsur mchi bar bgyid/ yabam mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa lta bu su zhig 'jig rten na tshangs pa'i sngagang blonamed pa den duganyarab na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
chung ba'i tshangs pa lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ ldang bam/ bsur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yabasu zhi ye shes mtshodapag tu med pa/ mimanyam pa
T+Tha dmanyamara'i chos rtogs pa 'tshol ban/ b.ladi rmig rjes kyi chu lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dgal 'dedapa la/ snang ba 'am/ bguramachi ba ma/ phyag
'tshal bar bgyid/ yab su zhig rig lta bu'i bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku don du nyar kha na/ yungs 'bru lta bu'i tingang
'dzan kyi stobs dang ldan pa'i nyan thos dgal ljang ba ma/ bsuramachi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshalab ma/ 'dud pa 'am/ 'dod pa skyod par bgyid/ yabasu zhig sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'dasa rnams kyi chab nyid shes rab dang/ bsod namasadang/ ye shes dang/ yon tan te ma dang zla ba'i snang ba dpag tumed pa lta bu thos nas/ srin bu me khyer gyi 'od lta bu'i
rang gi rgyud la snang ba gnas pa/ gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dgagi rnam par grol bal 'dedapa skyed par bgyid/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs sumya
0sa na las 'das kyang/ 1na thos rnams la phyagami 'tshalan/ bzhugs bzhin du lta ci smos/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ su zhig zla ba dang nyima'i dkyil 'khor btang/ srin bu me khyer
la phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab gnyan thos la rten pa ni nyan thos kyi sems dang gnas par 'gyur ro// yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang stanAnAthams cad mkhyen pa rin
poma'i sems bskyed pa dang gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bumomya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar khyod nyan b+bes 'di dag mthong bzhin
du mi ldang zhing bsur ma 'grol/ phyag mo 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur mi byed de/ 'di dag stan dang bsod snyoms la spyanam 'dren pa ni/ bu mo khyedalhag pa'i nga rgyal can ga ge/
daskad ces smras pa dang/ bumo myang named kyis byin pas/ ragi pha rgyal pomaskyes dga' 'di skad ces smras so// yab bdag ni lhag pa 'i nga rgyal can ma 'gas so// de ci'i
slad du zhi na/ yab khyed nyid grong khyer gyi dbul po rnams la mi bzhengs/ bsur mibazhud/ stan mi 'ding ba lags na/ khyod nyid lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rigs pa snyam bgyid
do rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de dag ni nga dang mtshungs pa ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pani/ nyan thos dang
rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang mtshungs pa ma lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nga rgyal dang dregs pa spangs te/ sam//
can thams cad du 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar mi byed dam/ bu mos sbas pa/ yab byang chub sems dpa' ni/ len du 'dzin pa dang/ tha ba dang/ khreb dang/ gnod
klu sems dang/ nyes pa sngangab dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sems can thams cad 'a 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'bo// yab nyan thos chen po 'di dag
lan khon du 'dzin pa dang/ khro ba dang/ gnod sems dang/ zhes pa spangab dang/ dag ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sminapar bgyiba'i slad du bya ba dang/ khro ba dang/ gnod sems dang/
nyes pa bsal bar bgyi ba'ang ma mchis/ spang bar bgyid pa dang/ dge ba 'phel bar bgyi ba'ang ma mchis ste/ yab nyan thos thams cad la ni sangs rgyas 'bum gyis nyan thos
kyi tshul khrims ji snyed pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa dang/ shes rab jisad pas tshes bstan du lags kyang/ yab de dag ni tshul khrims kyang gs mchis/ ting nge 'am/
kyang g las mchi/ shes rab kyang go sa mchi/ rnam par grol ba'angag las mchi/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar ng ga las mchi/ ya ba 'di lta ste/ dper na bum
00 pachab kyis bltams pa'i nang du char ba na/ de chab kyi thigs pa gcig kyang me len la/ deng gnas par yang 'gyur la/ lab de bzhin du nyan thos rnams la gal te sangs rgyas/
bumagyis ches bshad du lags kyang/ dadag 'dzinapar yang mi 'gyur la/ tshur khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shesarab dang/ rnam par grol ba dang/ rnam par grol ba'i
ya shosa mthong aba'apad dgo la gnas par mi 'gyur zhing/ rnam par 'phel bar yang ma 'gyur ro// yab 'di lta ste/ dper nargya mtsho chen po nitsang thams cad dang cham gyi
rgyunazams cad 'dzin cing/ der gnas par 'gyur ro// da'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen poni tshadam mchis pa'i slad du'o/ yababyang chub sems dapa' sems dang 'tshan re
mtsho lta bu de dgakyang de bzhin te/ tshes thams cad bstan pa'i chu thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing/ chos bstan pa thams cad de la yang dag par gnas so// de ci'i slad du
zhen 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rnams kyiTams cad m khyen pa nyid kyi samasakyi snod de ni mimanyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du'o// de la 'di
skad ces bya ste/ ma skyes dgra yi bu mor gyur ba// sku ngan mdabyen yon tan zi brjid brgyan// nyan thos lcabaspyad g ni lcags kyur kyang// del phyag bya'i phyir ni dam langs//
maskyes dgra yis de la smras pa ni// bumo don 'di nga lasam nyanapar gyis// khyod kyis nyan thos lnga brgya mthong bzhin du// phyagabya'i phyi nici phyir ldang mi byed// bumo mya ngan
med kyis byin la// nyan thos 'di dag bdag ga gis mthong ba na/ ci phyir phyag 'tshal bsam pa mi skyab// bdagamanyis pa/ba cigatshig ni gsan par gsol/ dpalan mi zhig rgya mtshor mni
k+kA nas kyang// rin chen 'byung khun gnas nii mching bu blangs// dbazhin bdagani nyan thos thamasacad kyang// ye shes dbyings nas nyan thos blangs snyam bgyid// dpar nargyal boner gyi dbang phyug/
po// sa bdag 'khor los sgyur bamanyes bgyis nas// kar sha pa Na gcig ma gsolanAni// de yis rgyal po bstan pa don ma mchis// gang gis 'khor los sgyur bamanyes bgyis nas//
bye ba phrag stong gsol ba bgyisonani// des ni dbul mang nor dang ldan par bgyid// desani la po 'gas par bstan pa lags// ka sha paN slong ba'i mi bzhin du/ gang zhig sangs rgyas
yon tan mtha' yasa rnams// thos nas theg pa dmanal 'ded skyed pa// nyan thos kun la bdag ni de snyam bgyid// nor rnams sgrub bgyid min ji ltab// byang chub sems dang 'amakhas pa da
'dra ste// rgyal bachos kyi rgyal pomanyis bgyis shing// byang chub re gnas sems can 'dul bar bgyid// dpar nand pa nad brgyas gzir rnams sman pa yis// grol bgyid de bzhinagazhan
gyi sgra phyir 'brang ba yi// nyan thos nyon mongs rnams kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang// byang chub sems dpa' sman palta bu s grol bar bgyid// sems can mang po grol bgyidasman pa btang
nas nii// sos gyur sems can lanisu zhig 'dud par bgyid// de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas smanang gter ban// sos gyur nyan thos la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid// ji ltar nad pa sos
par gyur pa thams cad l// sman pa dag gis gso bar nus par mi 'gyur ba// de bzhin nyan thos thams cad sos par gyur ba 'ad// sangs rgyas sman pa dag gis gso ba mi spyod do// 'di
nasman pa gang zhig bdag gis bdag nyid la// gso bar sems kyi sems can gzhan la ma lags te// de 'dra'i bdag nyid khengs par bgyid pa'i nga rgyal kyi// sman pa de dag la ni 'dod pa'i
sems mi slad// sman pa grwa zhig snying rje bskyed nas bdag nyid ji lta bar// de bzhin pha rol rnams kyang nd las grol bgyid pa// denamachod par 'os shing bsngags par bgyi ba dang// 'jig
rten kun gyis gdun par bagyi ba'i gnas kyang lags// gang gis leshes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas// bdag nyid grol bar bgyid kyi sems can gzhan ma lags// de ni sman pa
bdag nyid grol bar bgyid pa ltar// mkhas pa dag gis mtshed par bgyi ba'i gnas ma lags// gang gis ye shes rig ragatsobo rtogs gyur nas/ sems can grangs med sdug bsngal
[s ]@#/// dag las grol bgyid pa// de dag byang chub mchog la 'dun pa skyed pa ste// de ni 'jig rten kun gyis bsngags par bgyi ba lags// e rand yi shing sdong mdzesapa/
ma lags// de dag rnams kyi grib ma'ang yangs pa ma lags te// e ran da yongashing 'du nyan thos thams cad kyi// rnam par grol ba'i grab manye bar bstanam lags// tsan dan mtshig gi
ny+nyA sdong chen dag ni tsha ba yis// gdungs pa'i skye ba rnams kyis 'bar bstan pa lags/ de bzhin bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag gi don bgyid
snyam// ba lang rmag rjes ni yangs ma lags// tsha bas gdungs pa zhi bar mi bgyid la// gda'i klung ni sems can bye ba stong// ma par bgyis nas rgya mtsho chen por mchi// pa'i ngamig
rjes chu 'dra'i nyan thos kun// sems can kun gyi tshab zhi mi bgyid// ga'i klung 'dra'i byang chub sems M dwapa' rnams// sems can mtha' yas chos kyis tshim par bgyid// ji ltar rin chen/
charan 'bab pa na// dbul po dag ni 'gron bu lenA ra ra bgyid// gang zhig nor mang de dag blangs nas ni// sems can dbul po nor dang ldan par bgyid// de ltar sangs rgyas rin chen
tshes char 'bebs/nyan thos rnams ni dam chos rin chen las// chungang 'dzin te byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems can denaslad mang du len par bgyid// ji ltar sems can
dguni'i 'bakyi// dung dumachi an gsar gyi mdog tu 'gyur// ri bo gzhan la sems can rnams mchis na// gser gyi kha dog can du yong mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dang namananari ba//
bzhin// gang dag mthusaMnib bcas skye dgu rnams// rnamagrel mdog tu kha dog gcig tu 'gyur// nyan thos rnams kyi ye shes 'dod mi bgyid// ma bcig ji ltar rtswa bun rtse mo ki/ zlal
pa'i thigs pas 'otog rgyas mi bgyid// rab tu khebs pa'i sprinakyis sa steng 'dir// mi par bgyid cing 'do tog 'phel bar bgyid// nyan thos thams cad zul pa'i bgegs pa bzhin//
byang chub sems dpa' rab khebs sbyin dang 'dra// snying rje mngon byas gang dag bsten nani// stong gsum dam chos chu yis tsham par bgyid// ka ra bA pa'i me tog dri mchog min// desani rgyas
ba bud mad dbaka' mi 'gyur// tsam pa ka yi me tog dri la dga' lab shaka yang de bzhin no// nyan thes kar bIr 'dri bzhin te// de dag shes pas skye dgu dga' mi 'gyur// kun
mkhyen dri can byang chub sems dpa' la// lha dang mi rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// gcig pu mchib de la mtshan cis// gang zhig sems can m 'a yas khrid pa rmad// nyan thosami
ringagacig pu mchib bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' dgan ded dpon 'dra// mgron zhig gzhan gyis stsal go'atshal ba dang/ skye bo kun la stsol bgyid kun mgron bzhin/ sgra 'brang tan
thes kun namagron dang 'dra// byang chub sesams dab kun la mgron bgyid bzhin// ga was la brten pas chu batshanapo las// gzhan dag bsgral ba nas par 'gyur gyi//
brtan bgyis gru yi ma du zhug nani// sems can bye bamang po sgrol bar bgyid// na thos khagawanges la rton pa lta bu ste// sems can gzhan dag sgrol bar ji ltar nus// rdzogs pa'i byung ba/
k+kA gur zhugs byang chub sems// sdug bsngal mtsho las sems can sgrol bar bgyid// ji ltar g.yul ngor bong bu zhonanani// dgra las rgyal bar nus par mi 'gyur gyi// glang chen rta dang shing zhen
nani// g.yul du lhags pa'i dge rnams tshems par nus// nyan thos rnams ni bong bu zhon pa bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' glang chen zhan 'dra sti// sems can kun la phan dang bde slad du///

de dag shing dbang drung du bdud kyang 'drenas// ji ltar bar snang skar mas rgyas gyur kyang// de dag gis ni mtshan me mdzesam 'gyur// zla ba rab tu rgyas ngangashar pas ni// mtshan mo mkha' la thig la
bzhin du mdzes/ yab ciganyan thos 'di dag skaram 'dra// rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bzhin// gang dag sems can kun la sman slad du// ye shes shar bas skye ba snang bar bgyid//
yab cig srin bu me khyer tshogs 'od kyis// las rnams la ni 'jug par ma nus kyi// 'dzam gling 'di na nyi ma'i 'od rnams kyis// byang pa sna tshogs brgya dag bgyid par 'gyur// nyan thos 'di dag/
srin bu me khyer du// de dag shes 'od yang dga mthong ami 'gyug/ sangs rgyas rnam grol nyi ma lta bu yi// shes rab ye shes kyis ni sems can 'gro'1 yab cigawa brgyadag gis skad phyu yab
ri dgas tshogs rnams 'brog pa mi 'gyur gyi// sang ga'i skad kyis glang chen ri dgas dang// byar bcas rnams kyang phyogs bcur 'byar bar gyur// yabacig deltar nyan thos lnga 'dur gzig/
de dag skad kyis bdud rnams skagam 'gyur/ rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod spyad pas// bdud dang de bzhin bdud sa skrag par 'gyur// yab cig rgyu 'di bdag gis mthong bas na//
theg pa dman pa dayog la 'dod mi skyid// su zhig bla med byang chub sangs nas ni// thog pa dman la 'dod pa skyed par bgyi// gang dag byang chub dam pa yongos sngangs nas// theg pa dman
la 'dedapa skyed par bgyid// de dag 'tshongan byed pa theb ma gyur// de dag mir skyes pa ni nyes par mchi// gang dgalhar bcas 'jig rten sman slad du// byung chub mchog la 'dun pa skyed
bar bgyid// de dag legasa'atsho rnyed pa legs par red// dedag mi lus thob pa legs par mchis// gang dag lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang// 'jig rtan sman sud las brgyad yin kyang
na gangadag rtag tu sems can sman slad brtson// de dag u dum ba ra'i me tog bzhin// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgrakhu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa'i di dag
thesanas cang mi sna bar gyur te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shAli'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ kyem bu tshe 'di spobs pa thogs pa med pa zhigan/ ci
bzod pa thob bam/ ma thob pa bdag gis 'di brtag par byar nges so snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bas/ bu mo mya named kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ bu bu mo
t+tA[c]da nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam/ smas pa/ ma yin no// rang sangs rgyus kyi thag pa la yang dag par zhugs sam/ sdus pa// ma yin ro// bu mo khyedaci zhig
don du 4 nyoran/ 'di ltar seng ge 'i sgra sgro[W]sa par byed/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra'i bu gal tabadag tshos 'ga' zhig don du gter na ni/ bdag seng ge 'i sgra ci'ang mi sgrogs pa
zhigan/ btsun pa shAri'i bu 'di ltar bdag nitshes gang yang don du mi gnyer te/ de'i phyir bdag seng ge 'i sgra sgrogs so/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci bu mo khyodatheg pa la yang
dag pa zhugs sam zhes zer bani/ btsun pa shAri'i bus chos ganga mngon sum du byas pa'i chos de la ni/ ci nyan thos zhes bya ba ma/ rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'am/ yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i theg pa rnam par gzhag pa yod dam/ gnas brtan shAri'i bus smras l/ bu mo tshes de la nithig pa rnam par gzhag pa mdare/ chos de ni 'di ltar mtshan nyid med
par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// bumeT sas bu/ btsun pa shA ri'i bumtshan nyid med pa'i chos la don duganyer btsizhig yod Ali'i bus snus nga/ bu mo tshes de la ni don du gnyer ba ci'ang mad de/ rgyu
gnasab na shA ri'i bus/ bumemya ngan med kyis byin pa gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// bumosangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang/ so so'i skya pa'i sa rnams ka bye brag ni ci yod/ tha dad du
dbya ba da/ bumos smras pa btsun pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang dben pa nyid la bye brag ni ci yod/ tha dad du dbye ba nici yod/ shAri'i bus sas pa/ bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba

tsa' med de// bumos snasapa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang dben pa nyid la ji ltar bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci'ang med pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu sas rgyas kyi tshes su
dang soso'i skye pe'itshesa rnams la'ang bye brag mad cing bdad du dbye ba med do// btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dpungan nam mkha' dang bla gab med pa'i ng bye brag mdacing tha dad du dbye pa ci

med do/ khatsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos nams dang/ so so'i skya bo'i tshes rnams la'ang bye brag med cing bu dad du dbye ba ci'ang med do// gnas ba/ na shA ri'i bu cang mi sna bar gyur
de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bu mo rkyang named kyis byin pa la'adi skad ces smras so/ bumo ci byed de skad ces zer ba las na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnamA
ni shin tu ches lhag pa zhig tu mthong la/ nyan thosakyi chos rnams ni shin tu dman par mthong ngam cin/ khyod nyan thos chen po rnams mthong n ljangabar yang mi byed/ phyag kyang
mi 'tshal/ bsur yang mi 'gro/ gtam yang ma zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms la'ang spyana'adren par mi byed/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ bumemya nganamed kyis byin pas// gnas brtan mo 'u
'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po snying ga gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasan skar ma'i gzugs su gtogs pa ji snyed cig yod pa shes sam/
molu'agal kyi bu chen pos smras pa/ bu mosems par zhugs nani kho bos grangs shas kyi/ snyoms par ma zhugs nanimi shes so// bumosasnas pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin
ga shegs pas ni lan cigamanyam par bzhag pa nyid kyis stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasagang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgan/sems can 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/
da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i ng rab tumakhyen na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi ltatismos te/ btsun pa
mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang nyan thos rnams kyi khyad par yin te/ 'di'i thadad du dbye ba yin no// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ sas
rgyas kyizhing 'jigs pan jisnyad cig yod/ 'chags pa ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bumo den mi shes so// bumos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa ni ji skad cig yod/ ma 'ongs pa ni jisnyadacig yod/ da ltar bzhugs pani ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bumo dan mi shes
so bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po sems can 'dod chags la spyod pan ji snyed cig yod/ zhe sdang laspyod pa ni ji med cig yod/ gti mug la spyod ngan ji snyed cig yod/
chamanyam pa la spyod pa ni ji snyed ci yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bumo ni mi shes so// bumos smras pa// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po nyan thos kyi thog ba ba'i bams can
ni ji snyed cig yodo/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ban jisnyadacig yod/ thogapa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa ni jisnyad cig yodashes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bumo de ni me shes so//
butshos snusal/ btsun pa mo'u 'galakyi bu chen po nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji sud cig yod/ ngasangs rgyas kyis 'dul ban jisnyad cig yod/sasargyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems
can ni jisnyadacig yod shes sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mod ni mi shes so// bumos snyas pa/ btsun pamo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po yang dag pa dadu nges pa'i sems can niji snyad/
cig yod/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can ni jisnyad cig yod/ mdzes pa'i sems can ni ji skad cig yod shes sam// mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras ra/ bumo de ni mi shes so//
bumos sas pa/ btsun pa'i 'agal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshags pas nai de dag dang/ gzhan yang de gong du gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyenan/
sems can gzhan dag gi lta ci smos te/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i blama'i khyad par yanan// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs rwa
khyod rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan gyis/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams sposakyi 'od ces bya ba gangan de bzhin gshegs padag bcog pa yang dag par rtse gas pa'i
sangs rgyas spos rab tu 'gyod pa'i 'od bar da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes l/ bya rub sems dapa'i rnams la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyus kyi zhing de na/ shipaljon pa thams cad las tsan

dun sbrul gyi snying po 'i sos gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing di khyab ngar 'gyur ba'i spos kyi ngad ldang ba yod pa der song zhig/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos stsasang/ bum sangs rgyas kyi zhing

pa'i ming yang da kho bos gded thes na/ sangs rgyas la blta ba dang/ tshes mnyan pa'i phyir ji ltar 'gro bar bya/ de nas bu momu nganamed kyis byin pas zi de las ma 'ongs bzhin tshig 'di skad ces smras/
taM bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed ma thag tu nyan thos dang ngas sargyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa lhan/ bden pa dang
bden 'i tshig des de bzhin gshegs pa spos gang tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer des bdag nyid dang/ rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ston par gyur cig tsan dan gyi dri de dag kyang
na thos chen po 'di dag gis tshor bar gyur cig ces byas so// de nas bumo myang named kyis phyin pas tshig daskad ces snasam thag tu/ bdenapa'i byin kyi rlabs des/ bcom ldan 'das de
ba nan gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer gyis/ de nyid kyitsho'od gang gis nyan thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams smos kyi 'od de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer de chos ston cing bzhugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od sku las bkyago/ tshes bstan pa de'angs sargyas kyi mthus
'jig rten gyi khams 'dir thos so/ tsan dan sbrul gyisnying po'i dri des kyang 'jig rten gyi khamasami mjed 'di khyab par gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa spos ra tu 'gyed pa'i 'od Tar des kyang gsung/
gi yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i tshig gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bumo mya nganamadakyis byin pas ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po
bskyodamathagatu nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon te// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bya rgod kyi phung po
gnas pas tsan dan sbyal gyising po'i dritshor nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cas gso'ato// bcom ldan 'dasatsanadan sprul kyi nga re'i 'di ga las byung gas/ daskad ces gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byamasapa bu momyunganAmadakyis byin pa 'dis nyanathos chen po rnams kyi mdun dusangaga'i sgra bsgrags te/
de nas tan thos chen po de dag la bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rtan gyi khams sbos kyi 'od ces bya ban/ dbazhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams la chos ston cing bzhugs pa'i ng bstan/ 'jig rtenagyi khams sos kyi 'od de'i tsan dan sbyalagyi snying po'i dri des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par byas so//
denas bumo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pomakhas pa su zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems/
dpa' chen po dag khatshe 'phrul dang/ rnamapar 'phrulapa bsam gyisami khyab pa rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu dag mthong sa/ thesan/ nyan thos dman pa/ zhan pa/ zhum pa/ nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dngawAn
[o]pa rnams la snang ba 'am/ bsu 'gro ba'am/ phyag 'tshal bar byed/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal kyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams sos kyi 'od de ji tsamadu thagari bshesasam/ mo'u 'ga' kyi bus snyas/
pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos sas pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bachen po gal te khyed 'dra ba'i rdzu 'khrul can sha stag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang dran bu/
ramangashing gi tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshala'am/ bdam bu'i tshal lam/ 'bras sa lu'izhing bzhin du mtshams med par gang bar gyur nas/ de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa brtsis kyang 'jigarten/
gyi khams sos kyi 'od ces bya ba de sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig 'das pa'i pa'o na 'dug pa bgrangala'i thabs kyis rtogs par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegasal/
spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer gyis 'od de dgami snang ba'a mdzad de/ sasaN+yas kyi zhing de'ang mi snang bar mdzad re// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/ bumomya ngan
med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod kyis kham ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de sngon mthong m/ bu
mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po da bzhin gshis gas pa mthong bar nus sam/ de bzhin gshegs pas/ gangadag nga la gzugs su mthong
pas stong bar zhugs pa ste// skye ba de dag ngami mthong// sangs rgyas rnams zhitshes nyid lta// 'dren pa rnams nitshes kyi sku// tshes nyid shes bar byayin pas// deninam pa shesami
nus// zhes ma gsungs sam/ btsun pa 'dasusachen po gzhan yang bumo khyod kyis btsemaldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa sngon
mthong ngam zhes daskad zer bani/ btsun pa 'od saMsachen po bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong modakyi/ sha'i mkhagagis ma yin te/ gzugs su ma yin no// lha'i mig gis ma yin te/
'bar ma yin no// shes rab kyi mig gis ma yin te/ 'dushes sum yin no// chos kyimig gisam yin te/ 'du byed dum yin na// sangs rgyas kyi mig gis ma 'an tu/ rnam par shes par ma
yin no// btsun pa'od srungasachen po gzhan yang badag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ dper na gnas brtan gyis ma rig pa dang sridapa la srid pa mthong ba bzhinano// btsun pa 'od srungs/
chen po gzhan yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ dbadran gnas brtan gyis ngar 'dzanipa dang/ nga yir 'dzin pa mthong ba bzhinano// gnas brtan 'od srungs chen 'os smras pa/ bumo/
'di ltar ma rig pa dang srid pa la srid pa dang/ dma'adzani pa dang/ nga yir 'azhi pa'i tshes 'di gnyis ni mid pa yin no// chos gang red pa de ni blta bar mi nus so// bumemya ngan med kyis byin pa
lcas pa/ btsun pa 'od susachen po de de bzhinano// tshes thams cad named pa yin te/ de dag ni bltab minas so// 'od sas chen pos sbas pa/ bumo ci sas rgyas kyi tshesakyang med ma/ bu mos
smras pa/ gnas brtan sangs rgyas kyichos rnams sam/ so so'i skye bo'i tshesa rnams kyang rung ste/ chos 'ga' zhig yongs su grub par 'dodadam/ 'osrusachen pos smras pa/ bumo kho baniso
