go'i skye bo'i chos rnams la'ang yongs su grub par mi 'dodon/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams l lta ci smos/ bu mos snas pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po chos gang dag yongs su grub bamed pa'i
tshos de dag ci yod pa yin nam/ 'on te med pa yi/ bodasusachen pos smras pa/ bumo med pade dag ni med pa yin no// khu mos sbas pa/ btsunapa'od srungs chen bo de bas na/ tshos thamasacani/

med pa nyid do// med pa gang yin pa de dgulanilta ba rnam par sbyabar bya ba med de// btsun pa 'od srungasachen po rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas la lta ba rnam par sbyang bar 'dod pas nai bdag/
lta ba rnam par sbyang bar bya'o// 'dasusachen pos sbasal/ bumo bdag la lta ba ji ltar rnam par dag par 'gyur bu mos sbas pa/btsun pa'i dasus chen po gang tshang dag dang bzhi//
med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyang rang bzhinamadapa nyid dumosan/ de tsam gyisan bdag gal lta pa rnam par dag par 'gyur// 'od srungs chen pos smras paM/ bumo bdag girang bzhin ci yin/
spya// bumos smagapa/ btsun pa 'dasusachen 'obadag gi rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid do// bdag ni rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ bdag dben pa'i ng yin no// rang bzhin med pa des bdag
dbenano// rang bzhin med pa des chos thams cad dbanano// 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bumo khyed kyis su las chos thosan/ 'di ltar khyod kyi yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes par gyur bumo

[â€“ ]/ yang dag pa'i lta ba skye ba'anirgyu gnyis dang rgya naganyis yod de/ gzhan gyisgradang/ bdaganyid kyi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las 'byung ngo// zhes deskad gsungs so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun

pa 'od srungs chen po gang dag gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa'i shes rab can de dag ga ni gzhan gyi sgra dang tshul bzhin du so sor rtogapas ltaba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po gang
dag gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes rab can gni gzhan kyi sgra mi 'tshol le// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po ji ltar nadage slong tshulabazhin du zhugs pa yin/ 'od srungs chen pos sbas pa/
bumo gang gi tshe dge slong ji skad thos pa'i chos rnams kyidon la bar rtog par byed pa de ltar na dge slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin go/ 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ltan byang chub semA
! dpa' tshul bzhin du 'ugs ba yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od sungasachen po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i sems can thams cad dang lhan cig gnas kyi sems can du 'du shes skyod pa mi

byed pa de ltar na/ byang chub sems dapa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// btsun pa 'od susachen po zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ni sngon kyi mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no// chos thams cad ni phyi

ma'i mtha'idibazhin nyid dbaldan no// chos thams cad ni da ltar byung ba'i dbazhin nyid dang ldan nozhes/ btsun ba 'od sus chen po byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba de lta bu s sbyor bar mkhyedan/ de tsam gyis
nabyang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bumatshes dedag la ji ltar sbyar bar bya/ bu mos sa pa/ btsun pa 'od srungasa chen po jiltar de bzhin nyid
la sbyor ba'ang med/ mi sbyor ba'ang yod pa mthong ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la sbyabar bya'o// 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bumoji ltar mthong natshos thams cad mthong ba yin/ bu gos smras
pa btsun pa 'od susazhan bo tshos thams cad l gnyis su med par mthong la/ mi 'byed cing 'jig pa yang mi byed na/ de ltar na chos thams cad mthong ba yin no// btsun pa 'dasusachen po mthong
zhes bya bde ni mthong ba med pa'ig bla dgas so// 'od sungs chen pos smras pa/ bumo bdagaji ltar blta bar bya/ bumos snas pa/ btsun pa 'od srus chen pos ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du blta/
bar bya'o// 'od srungasa chen pos sbas pa/ bu mo kho bos ni bdag dang bdag gi ma mthong ngo// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po ji ltar bdagamed cing bdag gi med pa de bzhin du chos
thams cad bltab bya'o/// gtam de skad du brjod pa'iskabasasu gnas brtan po khyor gyis/ bumomyan med kyis byin pal 'di skad ces smras so// gu
mkhyid kyi spobs pa'i di 'dra bani khyod kyis red pa legs par dad// bumo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor spyod pa lasani spobs pa mi gyu gyi/ gang gis ci'am
pany+tsA/ da bde sobs pa dang ldan zhing/ gang gis nang ngam phyi rol ci'ang mi dmigs pa despobs pa dang ldan pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis snasal/ bumog ma dan sobs pa dang ldan pa yin/ bu
mos sas pa/ gang gis bdag ma red cing gzhan ma yin/ dge bam yin/ mi dge bas yin/ khan ma tho ba dang bcas pa ma yin/ khan mthob med pa ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas bam/
( 'an/ 'gag pa med pa ma yin/ 'dus byas g yin/ 'dasamakhyasam yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mengs pa ma yin/ rnam pabyang bam
yan te/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa ma red la/ so so'i skyakhe'i chos ni dmigs shing/ 'phags pa'i chos kyang mdamigs te/ sangs rgyas kyitshos mi dmigasan/ btsun pa rab
sgo 'byor de ltar nagang gis ci'amare dpa slobs pa dang ldan pa yin no// rab 'byon gyis smras ra/ ji ltar skyobs par 'gyur/ bumosags pa/ btsunapa ba 'byor gyis ji lta tshogs thams

thabacad maredapa de bzhin du de skyobs par 'gyur ro// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang gis gnas brtan nyon mongs pa med pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa'i chos kyi dbazhin nyid de ci brjod cing ra rung ngam/ nyon/
mongs pa med pa de dang/ chos kyi dbazhin nyid ngalatsi spobs pa ci'ang yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa dang de bzhache nyid ni bstan pa 'am/ brjod par mi nus so/ khu
mos sapa/ btsun pa rab 'byor tshes thams cad ni brjod du med pa yin na/ khyod kyis bu mo khyed spobs pa 'di lta bu dad ldan pa ni khyod kyis redapa lags pa red dogs bya ba de ji lta bu yin/
rab byed gyisasnyas pa/ bumo khyod ni 'di ltar med pa'i spobs pasaston te// bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor tshes than sa cad la brag ma lta bur mos sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras
ba bumo mos so// bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byoraci dragachaspobs pa ci'ang yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis snas/ bume danamed/ bumo sgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las sbya ba byung/
bar zad do// bumos smras ba/ btsun pa rab 'byor brtenanas sgra 'byu nga yin pa de lanarang bzhin gyis grub pa ci'ang mad de/ deci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar kango b gnas abyung ba de lani skyab
ci'ang med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/ bumo tshos thams cad ni brtenanas 'byung ba'o// dungos snasal/ btsun pa rab 'byor debasan tshes thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o// ba/
khyor gyis sbas pa/ bumogal tachos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ga klung gi bye ma snyadan 'das te gags ]
so// de bzhin gshegs pa daklugi phyim snyad nim 'os pan 'byung bar 'gyulo/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad ni da ltar bzhugs so zhis ci'i phyir bstan/ bums//
snyas ba/ btsun par b 'byengami bani bar ma 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa la ba'abyor tshes kyi dbyings lani skyabam/ nubapar gyur bam 'dod pa'i phyi ro kha
'byor gyis sas pa/ bumo khyedane'adi ltar skyobamed padon dam pa'i gson te/ bumos sbas pa/ btsun pa rabor bstanapa thams cad nibastan dumed pa'o/ de ci'i phyir zhan/ bstan
phyi thams cad bstan du med can/ dani bstan kyang rung ma bstan kyang m dngos bo ma yin te/ dngos po med pa dang brjod du med pa'i kha'am song ba'i phyir// 'byor gyis smras la/ bumo khyod ni khyim
na gnas bzhin du 'di lta bu'i chos la gnas shing/ 'di lta bu'i rnam pa dag ston pa 'di'i ngo mtshate// bumos sas pa/ btsun pa rab sbyor byang chub sems par sams dpa' chen po la ni khyim
pa'i m/ btubyungabazhes gzung bar mi bya'o// deci'i phyir zhen/ de dgan bsamalas phye ba yin/ gsarob kyis khyab yin/ yo shes kyis phyob yin pa'i phyir ro// btsun par ba'abyor
byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa khyodakyis shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis sa pa/ bumo khyod kyis shod cig dang kho bos mnyan to// bumos smas pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen ngo tshesabargyad dang ldan na khyim pa'i m/ rab tu byung ba nas mkhyan+te/ spyod lam gang dang gang gis gnas kyang kha nam tho ba med par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ btsun
ba rab 'byor 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sumatshogs pa yin te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa de'ang ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyi ko/
sems can thams cad yongs su ma gtong bar gnas pa'i phyir byams pa la gnas pa'i ng yin na// 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang/ spyod pa dngakhral ba'i phyir snying rje chen po la gnas pa'i ng yin no//
lus dang srog la mi lta ba'i phyir btang snyoms la gnas pa'i ng yin no// yongs su bsngo ba lamakhas pa shin tu rdzogs pa'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa' da yin no// lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'i

gyi shes rab kyi pha ro'od tu phyin pa las nges pa byung ba'ang yin no// dge ba'itsa ba 'tsho'i ba la brtson pas tshog mi shes pa'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i ng yin no// brjod pa shin tu thob pa'i
gyi mkhastan par shes pa'i ng yin te/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad po dadag dang ldan n khyim pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba zhes mi bya ste/ spyod lam gang
dang gang gis gnas kyang thams cad du khanam bamadapar 'gyur ro/ de nas tshodang ldan pasgragacan gyis/ bumo mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'di skad ces smras
so bgo byed m la khrigs kyi rkang pa can la dug cing ]stanashin dumathob la dug nas/ nyan thos chen pod gnang gtamakhribaden dubam yin pa gnas pa yin no// bu mo min bar snyan mathon po
T+Tha la'adug pa stan dma' ba la 'jug pas so bshad par ma bya'o zhes bya ba ci khyod kyisam thos sam/ daskad ces smras pa dang/ bsom nganamed kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan paskya gcan zin la'adi
gyu skad ces smras so// btsun pa sgra gcan zin 'jig rtenan gang dag ni ngu ba yin/ 'jig rten na gang dag ni rung ba ma yin la khyod kyis shes sam/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo khe bas shes
te/ gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pal slob cing/ bslab pa de 'as 'gal bar mi byed pade dag ni'u nga ba zhes bya'o// gang dag bslab pa de las 'galabar byed pa de dgagan rung bam yin pa zhes/
bya'o/ bumomya ngan med kyis byin pas smas pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin thong de skad ma zer cig/ btsunapasgragacan zin gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la slob pa de dag ni rang bum yin pa'o/

da ci'i phyi'i zhan/ 'di ltar de dag ni rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pade dag ni rang ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa sgra gcan zin rung ba zhes bya ba 'di'i dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa rnams kyi tshagi bla dgas
[o]yin te/ de dag ni bslab pa las 'gal bar mi byed de// de ci'i phyi zhen/ bcom ldan 'das kyi shanabyes rnams ni bslab pa las yang dag par 'dus pa'i phyir te/ da ni phyir yang bslab pa
'dod pa ma yin pas de dag ni rang bas yin no// de dag khams gsum du phyir mi 'ong ba yin/ dedag ni bslab pa lasalang dag par 'das pa yin te mi slob pa zhes bya// de lta na de dag gi
bsub panam dmagos te/ khams gsum pa btags pa tsam du shos so// de'i phyir der ni rung ba zhes bya'o/ sgragacan zin gyis smasal/ bumon par rung ma yin pa la thadad du dbye ba
ci zhig yod/ bu mos smras pa btsun pa sgra gcan zin 'di lta ste/ dpangan gses dang rgyan du byas pa dang/ rgyan dug byas pa la bdad du dbye ba ci zhig yod/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras ba

bumo bdad du dbyeb ci'ang medado// bu mos smras l/ btsunapas pa/can win de bzhin du rung ba dang dung bam yin pa lad yige'ib sadamanyam pa nyid kyi phyir tha dad du dbye ba'ang yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe
na/ tshes thams cad nici dang yang bral ba'i phyir te/ rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin no// btsun pa skyagacan zin yang 'di skadadusnyan shin tumathob 'dug stao nyanatam zhes
borab l/ byang chub sems dpa' nitsA bting b.la'adug kyang shin tumathobal 'dug pa yin no// sgragacan zin kyis rgyas pa/ rnam grangs gangashes khyodadeskadawA/ bumis sasal/ btsun
khosgragacan zin 'di dzisnyam dusems/ byang chub sems dpas gangal 'dug ste byang chub thob par gyur/ smra gcan zin gyis sbas pa/ rtswa bting bal bzhugs nas byang chub
klobago bu mos smasapa/ btsun sgragacan zin ci byang chub 'i dpa' tshu bting ba la 'dug pa la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtagyi khams na tshes pa ma/ babyin nam/ 'jig rten/
T+ThA skyong sa/ de las gzhan pa 'og minaman chadakyi la gang ban pa de dag thams cad kyis lus batud de thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dang 'i zhabs gtug par khyedadam/ sgra gcan zin gyis
smasal/ bumo de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis jiskad smras pakhazhin no// du mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zina'i phyi rnam grangs des kyang/ dper na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
brtswa bting ba la 'dug kyang snyan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug pa yin gyi/ nyanathos tshapa'i 'dzig rten na 'dug pa de ltar yin par 'ag par bya'o// de nas rgyal pom skyes dgras
bumo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo btsun pa sgra gcan zirten/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de nyid kyi sras yin te/ bslab pa 'dod pa rnams kyi ni mtsheg yin na/
ci khyod kyis mi shes sam/ bu mo mu na med kyis khyen pas smras pa/ yab thong zhig tho zhig/ 'di ltar btsun pa gcan zin/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i sras yin zhes ma
[z/]gsungs shika/ dgas kyirgyal bosang le ral pa can codakhan btag pa ltabus wa skyed par 'gyur ba nam yang gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal bos sas pa/ bu mo de nim yin no//
bumos smras pa/ yab de bzhin dude bzhin gshegs pa seng ga'irtsal lta bu saN+Dagasal/ dmaba'i sa kyi 'khor los sbyang ba'i zham ji bzhin thosamadzes bam lags so// yab de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sras gang yin zhas yang dag pa'i snabs dang sman/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid yinen zhus dedag yang dag pa'i sa bsasago yab delta bsanade bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su sgra
lan par 'atsal bas nikhan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chug tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// gtam 'di brjod pa'i skabs sany+tsal bo ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo'i 'khong nas/ btsunamo/

shus glanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de// lha'i bu brgya tham pas kyang bu mo de'i sa ga'is 'di thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusems baskyod/
da/ tsha 'di skad du bdag cag 'di rnams bdas ba dang/ mkhyen pa dang/ daltar byung ba'isangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams kyi sras su khas len to zhes kyang snasaso// lha'i bu de dag gis
'di ltar bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal bo'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad lha'i me tog gis mngon par gtor do// de nas bu momya ngan med kyis byin
pa khri gser gyi rkang pa can las babs te/ nyan thos chen po de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas// bza' ba dang/ bca' ba dang/ bldag pa dang/ gzhib pa dang/

chung bar byab bsod pa mang bo dag las khagar stir byas te/ dadapa dang gus pas rang gi lag nas nyan thos chen po de dag tshim par byas nas/ 'di skadadabatsun pa dag rang dgar sladadro bcom ldan 'dasal
sanyan dubazhud cig/ btsun pa dag bdag kyang mchi bar 'tshal zhes kyang sas so// de nas bu mo mya nganamed kyis khyin pa pham la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang/ skye bo phal bo
yongs su bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi zhabasalamago bos phyag 'tshal to/ phyogs gcibed tu 'dug go/ rgyal po btsun ma'o kher dang
bcas pas kyang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshalanas/ gnas sta phyogs gcig tu 'khodado// nyan thosachen bo de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshalanas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das khulo mya ngan mad kyis byin pa'i spobs panangomatshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu bu mo 'dis ni thog ma nyid du byang chub don du gnyerab na/ sangs
kyisabye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu gnyis la dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed do// shA ri'i bus gso'apu/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad dubu mo 'dis bud med kyi lus ma bsgyur/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di jisAm dusems/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la bud med de sa dusems nade ltar m blta'o/ byang chub sems dpa' dag ni sems can yosasu
smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lamagyis bdag nyidi bud medakyi gzugs su ston to// de nas de 'tsho bumo chungan med kyis byin pas bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs byas ti/ bdenapa'i sbyin
gyi bas gang gis chos thams cad skyes pa ma yin/ budamed kyang ma yin pa ltan/ bden pa dang bdenapa'i tshig des bdag skyes pa'i lus su gyur cig/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
'dis kyang mthong bar gyur cig/ ga de skad ces sasam thag tu bud med kyi mtshan ma mi snang bar gyur te/ skyes pa'i na tshan mabyung bar gyuranas/ steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun sridatsam du/
'bags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka'asal pa/ shAmi'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pomya ngan med kyis byin pa
stang bar snang la 'phags pa khyod kyis mthong ngam/ shAri'i dus gsol// bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ shAri'i bu byang chub sems
u@#/// dpa' sems dpa' n poskyon med kyis byin pa 'dinibaskal pa grangasamed pa bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar/ de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom
ba lang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas mya ngan med pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ tshatshad nibaskal pa brgyar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa bcur gnas par 'gyur ro// de'idge 'dunani byang chub
k+kA sams dpal 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur te/ phyi ma ldogapa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pobye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do// 'jib can gyi khams de'ang be DUrlu las grub pa/ rinapo
che sna bdun gyis bkra bar byas shing/ mig mangs ris su bres pa/ rin po che'i pad+mas khebs pa dang/ ngan song thams cad rnam par s+yas par 'gyur ro/ lha dang mi rnams kyi 'das spyod dag
kyang khyad par med de/ shAri'i bu dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi bar spyad pa dang/ longs spyodaji lta ba bzhin du mi rnams kyi'ang der de bzhin du 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems/
dpa'i mya nganamed kyisakhyenapa'i ma/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo dam pa klu ba can zhes bya ba des thal mo sbyar ba btudanas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dA
bdagagis skyes bu dam pa 'di dagu bladagar yan bzungabani/ bdag gisaredapalegs par redalags so// bcom ldan 'das bdagagis kyang banamed pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
sems bskyed par bgyi ste// dgaba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od de nyid du/ 'di'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA si'i bu sring mo zla ba can 'di khyod kyisa mthong angam/ shA ri'i bus
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shAri'i kha rgyal po'i btsun mo zla ba can 'din 'dinasashi'aphos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa lha
rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur zhing/ lha'i bu rin chen mchog ces bya bar 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i byams pas byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de'i tsho/ rgyal po
dung zhes bya ba'i bu rgyal po la gzhonanu mthong na dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur nus/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la mchod pa byas te/ rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// des dbazhin gshegs pa
byams pa'i dam pa'i chos thog ma dang/ bar ma dang/ thama'i bar du'adzanipar 'gyur te// bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur bdedas
thams cad kyang mnyes par byed cing mchod par 'gyur ro// de mthar gyis de bzhin gshags pa mya nganamed pas byang chub thob pa na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pomu khyud 'dzin ces byakhar
'gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa tshad med pa dgabyas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bu de skyed du blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
mngon par rdzogs pa'i tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od zer ces bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo zla ba can kyis bdag tade lung bstan pa thos nas/
tshami zhing na gu ste yirasanas/ bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba phul te/ tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyal pos gnang nas bab pa'i gzhi dag bzung ngo/
danas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pomya named kyis byin pas/ lhas phul ba'i me tog man da rab ga gas bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor thams cad la gtor te// da na
bar snang las bab te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshig 'di skad du bden pa dang bden ba'i tshig gang gi sa bdag gas byang chub theb ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen bo de dag thams cad rdzus ta zhing/ chos gos dus smigagyon la/ rin po che'i bdag la skyelatsho klobacas te skye bar 'gyur ba lta na/ ban pa dang bden pa'i tshig des dpa' na
slong bsnyen pa rdzogs nas labargya lonapa'i spyod lam tshilta babazhin du bdag gnas par gyur cig casams so/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pomya nganamed kyis byin bas
0bden paa'i byin gyis brlabs byas ma thag tu dge slong gi soda'am dang ldan pags snang bar gyur to/// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sams dpachen bomya nganamed kyis byin pas//
brgya'akhom skyes dgra laskad ces smras so// yab 'di lta so thams cad ni bcos ma ste/ rnam pa bsgrubs par nyobazhi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ yongs su brtags pa las 'das pa/
med pa zhan du phyin ni 'tshog dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags so// skyal botshan po gabris/sangashag dang/ de'ing bona'i gdugs gcig la bu mo'i gzugs sub gakhrigs/ khye'u'i gzugs
su'ang khyod kyis gzigs/ dani bdag la dag klong gi gzugs su'ang khyed kyis gzigs na/ 'di gang yang dag ba'ikakhrugs lags/ rgyal po chen pod ltar na lam bsla'i chos thams
cad l/ 'din khag lta ba'i kun nas kribs kun nasaklags ng mas terang gi rgyud lamachis pa nyon mongs pa rnams kyis yongs su sregako/ yongs su bsregs pas chos dul ba
'dim 'tshal te// gyod pa ma lags ba la spyod par sems so// rgyal po chen po dI ltar na khyod kyis bag yod pas mdzod la// rgyal sridetam nga ban bzhugs bzhin du/ rtag tu bcom ldan
'das kyiThad du bzhud cig dang/ jam dpala gzhon nu gyur bas khyod kyi yod pa ma yin pa phyin tsa'i ga las byung ba'i 'gyod pa sel bar gyur// rgyal po chen po khyed ni bya ba mang zhing/ byed
denasal bom skyes dgra dang/ btsun mo zla bcan dang/ btsunamo'i 'khor thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das dang/
byachub sems dang 'a mya nganamadakyis byin pa dang/ gaslongagi dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshalanas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bgyi ba yapa'i ng
rgyu brgyad pa mang ba'ags kyis/ bdag cag mchi'o/ bag ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ rgyal po chen bod de'i dus la bab par shes na so zhake ces bka'astsal nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra
btsunamo zla ba can ' sogs pa btsunamo'i khor chen po dag dang lhan cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i'i lasarkyal po'i khab kyi grongakhyer chen por dngang// de nas bcom ldan 'adas kyis/ tshe
dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyed kyis chos kyin m gungs 'di zung ga/ tshos shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ bzhan dag la'ang rer rab tu ston
cig/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dasamyos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis bzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'dimicigs/ 'diri ltar gazubar bgyi

zi kham ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo de'i phyi ngos kyi rnam grangs 'dimyang namadakyis byin pa'i sangaga'i sa zhes bya ba dang/ myang namadakyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/
gzhan dag la'ang ston cig kun dga' bo gang gis stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yin po tshasna tshogs kyis los su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas/ gang gis chos kyi/
rnam grangs 'di than sna lam du thos na/ 'di'i dbas ches bsonamasamang du skyodan/ gapa'i dzan pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ 'cha[E/]ba dang/ klogapa dang/ rjod pa dang/ lung ji
skad phog pa bzhin du nan tan dusgrub pa lta cisos// bcom ldan 'das kyis deskad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dapa'i samasadapa'i tshan pomya nganamadakyis byin ba dang/
nyan thos chen po de dag dang/ lhadang/ mi dar/ lham yin dang/ dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de// 'phags pa dkon mchog
brtse gas pa chen po'i chos kyi rnamagras stong phrag brgyapa las/ 'phagasapa mya namad kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so//
rgya gar gyimakhan po dza nam tA dang/ su ren dra bo d+hitang/ lotsa ba zhang yo shes sdes sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ bam po gcig/ shi ka sum brgya//
rgyagar skadadu/ A r+ya bamal dad ta pariwIts+tshanAm mahAyAn sUtA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med kyis byin pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
bam po dang bo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal la/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal brgya 'byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra khan/ dge slong stopatis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu
bzhubs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ ba dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/
cang shes pa/ glang po chen po// bya ba byas l byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems ni
tu rnam par grol kha/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/ gang brag gcig ma gtogs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/
byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu phal cher thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
shes rab brtsegs dang/ khyodachub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying bo dang/ byang chub sems dapa'i krags pa'iblo gros dang/ spobs pa brtsigs dang/ spyan rasagazigs dbang phyag dngang/ mthu
[z chen thob dang/ byams pa dang/ mya nganamed kyis byin dang/ 'jam dpala gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ gom pa 'dor ba don yod dang/ mthong ba don yod dang/ ngan song songang/ myang n
kyimun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang/ yon tan rin po che'i ma tog gis rtag tu bskrun dang/ gas kyi 'phreng ba'i da kyi dpa' na dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sal ba dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems thogs pa med pa dang/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri dang yang thabs gcig ga/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu da nga/ tshe dang ldan pa
mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen podang/ dang ldan pa byams ma 'bu gang bo dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang/ tshadapaldan pa nam krudang/ tshe dang ldan pa ma
'gagasapa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ nyan thos chen po brgyad po da ngag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang/ byang chub sems pa' nasong stong dang/ rin po che
tog dang/ mthong ba don yod dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang/ 'phags pa spyan rasagabrigs dbang phyug dang/ spobs pa brtsegs dang/ byang chub sems dapa'
gom ba 'dor ba don yod dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad po de dag snga dro'i dus kyi tshongasham thabs dang chos gos bgos nas/ lhung bzed thogs te//
na bzhi bcu kanyis dkon brtsi gal
bsod sogs kyi phyi'i grong khyenangomanyan yod du zhugs nas/ dag/lam gyi bar skabs su gtam 'di skad ces/ gang gis grong khyer du skye ba'i tshogs thams/
cad kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam thos par gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o zhes brjo dar gyur to// de nas/
tshe dang ldan pa shAn+ti'i bus smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du 'phar sa pa'i bden pa rnams l/ skya bo'i tshogs thams cad kyishos bzlogs pa med// de dag gi shes bal mun pa mun
nag dpar 'gyurabs pa de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du
skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la bdud kyi las rnams 'khyungabar mi 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting 'dzani la kho bo snyomasaparazhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa byams
ma'i bu gang bos pasal/ ci nas kyang gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang sku kun tu rgyudang/ gcer bu pa dang/ 'tshob bdang/ bram zeng/ khyim bdag gang dang grongakhyer na
[4 ]sdus pa/ cinas kyang grong khyer na skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bumogang dag bdag cag la bsod snyoms sbyin par byed pa 'bod pa de dag thams cad yongasasu mya ngan las
'das pa la thug gi bar du/ las spyod zad mi shesapa redapangagyur b rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzanil kho bo snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshodang ldan pa rab
byor gyis sasapa/ gang gis grongakhyerd skye bo'i tshogs thamasacad nyon mongs pa med pa thob par 'gyur b rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzini' khob snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du
'jug par bya'o// tshod ldan pa nam grus smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skyabo'i tshogs thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'iting nge 'dzin la kho khe snyoms pa zhig
taM/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas sbas pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad nadamadapa'ibade ba thob pa 'gyurab rnam pa de lta bu'i tingang
'dzan la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos sbas pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams
mngon du 'gyur ba rnam pa dalta bu'i ting nge 'dzanil kho bo snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du'ajugapar bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas snasal/ cinasakyang gang gis grong khyenamo dang/
'a/ skar khung dang/ rtsigapa dang/ snodadang/ rgyun dang/ shing dang/ 'am dang/ ma tog dang 'bras bu dang/ gosanams las stong pa nyid kyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba
dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang/ smon pa med pa'i sgra dang/ skyobamed pa'i sgra dang/ dngos bomadara'i sgra dang/ bdagamed pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam/

par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' dran song sbyong gis smras pa/ gang gis grongakhyer na sems can rnams kyi las ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba gang yod pa de tsho 'di nyid la yang zhing chung du myong bar 'gyur ba

kyi rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' m thong ba don yod kyis smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang 'gyur ba de dag/
cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur b rnam ba de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/ byang chub sems dpa' chen pon tog gisasas gang gis grong khyer da dir pa pa
cad du zin pochos gang ba'i gtera rnams 'byung bar 'gyur b rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 52pa bas sang// 08
mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga po dag rnam par sal bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dnga' spyan ras//
[s]]gzigs dbang phyugagis smras pa// ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag bcings pa dang/ gsadaparab kri ba de dag tharang dang/ 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyang 'jigs pa mi dang
thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dang 'a spobs pa brtsegs kyis smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phan tshun du cha/
su bcad pa'i dbyangs dang/ byams pa'i sems kyis sa bar 'gyur ba dang/ spobs pa'i ng thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa da lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byung chub sems dpa'i gom pa

'der ba don yod kyis sbas pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer nasems can gang dag khe be'i mig laman snang bar 'gyur ba dang bag thagasacad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang rlung las phyir mi ldeg
par 'gyur ba rnam pa dalta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsamapar bya'o// danas nyan thos chen po dgu dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnam pa lta bu'i gtam 'dirjod cing/ mnyan yodakyi grong
khyab chen por phyin to// yang de'i yul ko sala'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bumo dri ma med kyis byin pa zhes bya ba/ sngonagyi rgyal bal lcagaparabya ba byasu// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyadang/
sangs rgyas mang po 'khasan bkur byas pa/ chos brab mol bzod pa dang ldan pa// mngon par shes pa lnga po dag thob pa zhig yod da da bu mo des lha'i mig dag pa me'i las 'das pas byang chub se ra
dba'adedag dang nyan thos chen po de dag mthong zhing/ de dag la gyi bar skabs su gtamaci brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang thos so// bumo da'ang gzugs bzang
mdzesal/ blta na sdug pa// kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan ng/ pha ma dang nang mir khyams pa/ btsas nas 'o bcu gnyis 'dapa sU/ de dpyid zla thachung tshos brgyad skar ma
rgyal gyi nyin bar phu mas dge mtshan dang bkra shis byed du gnang nas/ bram ze dang/ rtswa ku sha dang/ ma tog dang/ yam srog shing dang mar dang/ bum pa thogs pa lnga brgyas
'tsho yongs su bskor te khrus bya bar khrid pa'i s/ bras bri de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ nyan thos chen po de dag mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bku ni shis so snyam pa'i 'du
shes kyis gnas pa'i gyur to// de nas bram ze de dag gi nang nas bram ze chos bgros tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya ba des// bumo dri ma medakyis byin pa/ 'di skad cesas so// bu mo dag slong dag/
ra mdun nang khod pa ni bkra mi shis te/ da dag mthong na dgos pa 'am/ nor ma/ brtul zhugs sam/ mchod sbyin nam/ bkra shis kyang rung ste// mi 'grub kyi sa grong khyer du su ra bzhud do//
da nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de la tshigs su bcad de smras ba/ 'di dag tshog samed mchog tu dag shes pa/ skye bo mang po'i sdig ngo 'jig par byed// 'di dag
rnam par dag cing padan bzhi mthong// dulul kro' ba gyur cing mnyam par bzhag/ bdedag rkang gnyis dam pa bsod nams zhing// 'a de la yon shul mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di la yon shul//
'bras bu 'chi mda'athob// byin nas sems can ngan 'gror 'gromi 'gyur// tshul khrims dang nidul bar ldan ba yin// 'dod las brgal zhing sdig med bamed// 'di dag snyan pa mchog snga 'jig rtenargyu//
sdug bsngal gzir ba'i srol chags thar par byed// sangs rgyas 'jig rten dag na chos kyi rje// da'i sras 'di dag rdul med nyon mongasamed// 'di dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan yang mang/ shes
rab ldan mis 'di dag ji ltar spang// 'di dag brtul zhugs spyad cing 'dodachagasazhi// bkra shis rgyug cing mkhas pa sbyin mar phab// 'di dag rnams la bkur sti chung byas kyang// mi rnams ches
dang de bzhin nor yang 'grub// 'di dag mtshan rnams yongs rdzogs dge shis ldan// 'di dag zhing mchog rnam dag sems dang ldan// bram ze 'di la su zhig dad byed pa// dani bsod nAnas mang/
bo spyod par 'gyur// de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i sa bumo dri ma med kyis byin pa tshigs su bcad de slar s pa/ byis pa'i sems kyi dbang du gu pazhud cig/
mtshod sbyin dus 'dir dag slong ma gzigs shig/ dur smrig gos can de bzhin mgo brags pa// dedag don 'dod ngasan blta mi bgyi// yab dang yum yang dkyen pa mi 'gal zhin bdag
kyang mkhas pa rnams kyis snyadapar 'gyur/ khyod kyi mchod sbyin 'grub par ma 'gyur gyis// de bas dge slong rnams ni shin tu skyongs// danas bu mo dAmamad kyi sabyin ngas/
bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de la tshigs su bcad de ra sa pa/ yon tan ldan pa 'di dag ma gtogs par/// pha dang ma dang kho mo'i skyabs ma yin// gnyenagyi tshogs dang nor dang lang tsho min/ 'di dag
'khor bar bying ba rnams kyi skyabs// bdaganyis rgyas dga' ba lus btang zhing// de bzhin srog dang 'angs spyod rnams kyang btang// dkon mchog gsum nyid skyabs yin ma gtogs par//
kha kha mi'i skabs rten soms can 'a dinamed// de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas/ butshe dri ma dad kyis byin pa la 'di skad cesmas so// bu mo btsunas khyed kyi sngon sangs rgyas
kyang mal zags/ sngon tshes kyang ma gsan/ sngon dang 'dun la bsnyen bku yang ma mdzad n khyod ci'i slad dusangs rgyas la dad par gyur// bu mo de ga med kyis byin pas smras pa//

bram ze kho rebatsas nas zhag bdun 'don pan/ tsan dan gyi khang bzang kyi nangan gsogs kyi pu ra bzhag pa'i tshe/ lha'i bulnga brgya stong gi bar snang 'da' dngab khe mesamathos/ de dag rnamakhru drung du
mas sangs rgyas kyi bsngags brjod/ chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa rjod pa kho mos thos so// de nas lha'i bu de dag gi nan gnas gang gis sngonade bzhin gshegasala mthong ba gcig pu de
la/ lha'i b rnams kyis dres pa/ grogs po dbazhin gshags pa ni ci 'dra ba zhig/ de ni dziltar shes par bya/ de nas lha'i bu des kho re'i bsam pa shes nas/ lha'i bu dag kyang dad pa bskyed
ba'i phyir tshags subacad pa 'di dag smras so// de yi dbu skadri mdasnum zhing mdzes// gtsang 'jam g.yu sa su 'khyil ba'il 'don// ko ga pa/ rab gnas nga da byAturakaM dmar ba
mdzes pa bzhin// dpe mdzod kha ba shel mdogabazang// sman mtshamis bar nas 'khyil cing shin tu mdzes// de yi sa 'khor rnams wal gyis mnan te 'dug/ rgyal ba'i zhal yang shin tu mdzes par byed/
mi dbang spyan mdzes 'gram pa seng ge 'du/ sems stobs ma zhu mtshams mnyam thags kyang bzang// de yi lcags mnal gyid kyi 'khor khebs// de yi zhal ni rimad rnam par na sa// de yi gsung ni

phan zhing sAnal na// tshig rtsu ba sangasashing me'abyed sdig pa med// skya bo dpag tu med pa dang mdzad cing// 'gro la phan rgyal ba gsung 'ang sgrogs// de yi na gur ru dung dang mtshungs shing 'dra/

de bzhin mi dbang phyag gi sor mo rong// de yi phyag ni glang chen sna dang 'dra// brang yangs dugad lta ba gzhol zhing zab// rta mchog lta bu ng mdams kyi sba ba nub// de ba ston spyi yi khung bu gsar pang 'dra//
brla yi dbyibs ni glang po'ilag dang mtshungs// zhabs ni legs gnas byin pa ertsa'i 'dra// thub pa'i dbang po bden gsung rgyags pa'i skyon dang bral// ngan ltos bcom pa rnams kyi
sdig pa'i lta ba 'jig/ 'khor gyi nang du dri ba bya ba dris byas kyang// 'khrul med skyon dang bral bsasems can kun tsami mdzad/ gya gyu med drang dag gis lus nam/
mdzad cing// mya ngan 'das po bde mchog yid 'ong yang dag ni// skye bo kun gyi yid 'ong mya ngan 'das ston cing// mtha' gnyis dag dang bral ba'i dbu ma'i lam yang ston// de nas ng gas
sangs rgyas gyur pa ste// bdag nyid brgal cing pha rol rnams kyang sgrol// 'gro ba'i skyob dang skyabs dang dge shes shing// 'jig rten kun l thugs bcu phan par mdzad// ston
tsho ba de 'di yon tan 'di dag dang// gzhan yang mtha' yas kho mas de ma brjod// thosanas lha rnams yid dga' dad gyur nas// rgyal ba yin dang ba'i yid kyang sgom// de nas bu mo dri ma med
kyis byin bas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/ bram ze tshangs pa'i lhal 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze kho mo btsas nas zhag bdun len nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnam
lcaba'i de lta bu dag thos so// mngon par dran te de tshun chad nam yang rmugs pa dang/ gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to// num yang 'dod pa 'o rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang/
gnod sogs kyi rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang/ 'tsho ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog par ma byas so// mngon par dran tade tshun chad nam yang pha la dga' ba'am/
ma 'a dga' ma/ ming bo la dga' ba'am/ sbyan la dga' 'am/ tadul dga' ba 'am/ nor la dga' ba 'am/ rgyana' dga' ba 'am/ gos la dga' ba 'am//
lus la dga' ba 'am/ srogal dga' ba 'am// grong khyer la dga' ba 'am/ skye mched la dga' ba ma bskyed kyi bram ze gzhan du na sangs rgyas nyid rnam pas rjes su dran
ni// bram za kho mos ni gsum sems la yid 'byab yid labyas te/ de bzhin gshags pa phyogs gang na bzhugs pa dang/ de bzhinagshegs pas chos gang bshad
ba de thams cad kho mos legs par yongs su bzung zhing/ khoms don tam tshig 'bru lus yi ga dang tshig gcig kyang chud byas par ma byas so// de pazhin gshags pa dang/ slong ge
dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba kho mes nam yang yid lamabyas par ma gyur to// kho mos nyin mtshan gang du'ang sangs rgyas ma mthong ba dang tshes ma thos pa dang/ dge 'dun
la bsnyen bkur ma byas par mgyur te// bram ze kho mo ni sangs rgyas la blta ba dang/ chos mnyan pa dang/ dge 'dun pa bsnyen bkur bya bas chog pa med de/
de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas/ bram ze'i khye'u zhig la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye ru khyod song la rgyus 'dirgyal po dang patsun mo la gsol cig/ de nas bla za'i khye'
de rangs pa'i tshul du song ste/ ji ltar mthong ba'i lo rgyus thams cad rgyal po dang btsun mo la gsol to// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas kyang ji ltar bram ze tshangs
pa'i lha la sogs pa bram ze lnga brgya po de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tu sems bskyed pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod/ chos dang dag
'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa shing rta las babs nas/ bram ze de dag dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag
tsho dang nyan thos chen po de dag ga la ba der song sba phyin nas/ de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gus pa dang bcasazhu sa dang bcas pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
ba'i bu'i mdun du 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'a ra de skad ces smras so// shA ri'i bu bud mad ni
shes rab song gnyis ba/ nyon mongs pa drug pa/ bag med pa mang ba/ dman pa la mos pa// tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i dbang du mchi ba ga na
bdag la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ ci nas bdag gi yun ring po yi den dang/ sman pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ btsun pas de ltar bdag la tshes legs
par bstan du gsol// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ga5 da pa 5/ dang prasA 38 spyi nas myur pa'i tshul gyis phyogs der phyin te/ des nyan thos//
de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la phyag byas nas/ rang gi bu la 'di skad ces smras so// mu tsho khyod su re (kho re no yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyisanon pa ramagyur to//
nam yang dga' ba dang rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sems ma bskyod de nas bor ba de ltar khyed bde ba dang bad bad ba la brtson nam// 'on te 'di ltar yid byung ba'i tshul gyis/
de nas rgyal po la gsal rgyal gyis/ rang gi bu mo la tshags su bcad de smras pa/ khyod kyi gzugs byad lha yi bu mtshungs shing 'du// rgyana rnams kyis ni de nyid ches pa'i cha byad 'dzin//
ji ltar khyod ni nam yang gnyidakyis ma non pa// ci phyir bu mo khyod ni 'di 'dra'i yid byung gyur// khyed kyirgyal srid rgyas shing shin tu legs par 'byor// ma ni rtag tu khyod kyi dbang du gyur pa
yin/ dbu mo dga' ba de las ci 'dra gzhan yod na// de yis khyod kyi lus ni dga' ba redam gyur// sdug cing 'phangs 'al yid du 'ong ba ste// skye bo kun la dga' ba skyid yin na//
yon tan brgya phrag du mas brgyan pa khyod// ci yi phyir na khyim 'di'i dga' ba med// bu mo khyod kyisaci zhigo thos gyur cing// ci zhig mthong na 'di ltar yid me bde// yos su nyams
bya/ shing yid byung sams sukhyur// khyod kyi 'dod pa ci 'du nga la skyes/// de nas bu mo dram bad kyis byin pas/ rang gi nga rgyal po kha/[.]rgyal grwa tshigs/
su bcad de smas pa/ yab cig [Ã©]nga po ches dmogs snod rnams dang// khyim gyi skyon rnams thugs su ma tshud dam// 'khor ba'i gnas nikar la lta dang mtshungs// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten mi
gnas 'jig pacan// sbrul gdug nang na gnas pa'i khyim 'di 'a// gnyid dang 'ded pa'i 'dun pa gal mas// khams bde dag ni gdug pa'i sbrul bzhi ste/ srang mas pa
bde ba ga la mchis// mi mdza'atshogs kyis rab tu gtsaN gyur cing/ dgon par phyed dga' ba gdal ma ches// kun nas nyon mongs dgra ga sa sa pa u0f7cnga nas/
'thob rgyal pos bka' stsol cig/ dug 'thungs pa la bdo ba ga la mchis// gsad sar bkri la dga' ba ga la mchis// ga5 nga sa che 'dir su zhig yod rkon pa/ la sha/
ba'i 'jigartan de dag mtshungs// blo ngan dag gis lus rnams bor ba ni// ri rab tsam gyi phung por gyur to zhes// de bzhin gshegs pas dang/ na ni
byas slu ba'i tshes pa su yid rten// ja dngam dang sdug dang mang po dang// bu dang rtsa lag gnyen grogs 'grib kun// 'dus byas thams cad me long gzugs ngan/ de
mi sdug gang 'dra su yid rton// gang tshe bdag gis rang byung rgyal ba mthong// de tshe sangs rgyas 'gyur snyam sems kyang skye/ byang chub sems dpa' bag med bgyur ba ni// yabacil
bdag gis ma mthong ma thos so// bdag gni mtshan rdzogs rgyal ba lta 'tshal 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i tshos kyang shes/ rgyal ba rgyal ba'i sras ngo 'di dag
la thong// yab cig ji ltar 'dod pa bston par bgyi// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bu mo'i reg thos nas cang mi sna bar gyur te// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas
rang gi pha cang mi smra bar gyur par rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces sus so// btsun pa shAri'i bu khyod la zhu ba zhus pa klu sa ba dgongs te lan gdab tu gsol//
'di ltar btsun pa shA se'i bu ni/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis shes rab dang ldan ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ rtsi shes rab de 'dus pya pa ma/ 'on te 'dus ma byas
'gas/ de galate 'dus byas lags na/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'dus byas thams cad ni brdzun pa slu ba'i tshe nang na 'a[']de// 'dus ma byas 'a gsun/ 'dus
ma byasul ni skye ba ma mchis so// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la ni phrad pa ma mchis na/ pad pa ma mchisaM pa 05 kyi 0 8 bushes ba chen zhes bgyi/
danas[@]dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu cang ma sa bar gyur to// de nas tsho dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// shA'i
bu bu mos dris pa lan thob cig/ shA ri'i bus smras pa// bumo ni 'dus byas mi badri'i// bu mos ni skye ba med pa dris te/ rini lan gdab par ma nus so/ la
nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyed ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci ste tshe dang ldan pa sems can du 'du shes pa la gnas te rdzu 'phrul ston tam/ 'on te chos su 'du shes pa la
gnas kyi rdzu 'phrul ston/ gal te sems can du 'du shes snga la gnas te ston na/ sems can mchis pa ste/ de lta bas na rdzu 'phrul dbang ma mchis par 'gyur
ro/ ci ste tshes su 'du shas ba la gnas te ston na/ tshes nyid ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'i// 'a gyur ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de la ni rnam pa'i rtog pa ma mchis na/ rnam
par mi rtog pas ji ltar tshe dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'a byor par gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'ang rang mi sna bar gyur to// de nas byams ma'i bu ga nga pos/
tsho dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bu mos dus pa'i lan thobacig// mo'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bumo ni 'gyur ba mi
'di'i/ bumosani 'gyur ba med badris te/ 'gyur ba med pa dang/ rnam par mi rtog pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam sa kyi byang chub yin pas/ den lan gdab par mi nus so/
danas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pasaM/ byams ma'i bu gang bo la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa gang po ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshes sna ba
rnams kyi mchog tu bstanapa lag gsan/ cu tshe dang ldan pa dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos ston tan/ 'on te dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i chos ston/ gal te dmigs pa
dang bcas pa'i chos ston na ni/ khyod byas pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni dmigs pa dang sa pa'i slad du sku
de lta bas na btsun pa'i ng byas pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi chos rnams dang ma bra'akha 'gags/ ji sa dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i chos ston n ni so sna ba nyid dngos
bo ma mchis par gyur te mi 'thad de// de nas tsho dang ldan pa gang po'ang cang mi sla bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/ gang po la 'di skad ces snas
so// gang bo bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ tshe dang ldan pagang pos smras pa// bu mo ni kun rdzob ma 'a dri'i/ bu mos ni don dam badris// de ni
lan gdab par mi nus so// de nas bu mo du ma med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar btsun pa 'od sus chen/
poni ma par n pa brgyad la snyoms par zhugs nas langs te gzhan dag la chos ston cing/ gang dag 'os tha na gzar bu gang tsam gyi bsod snyoms yongs su blangs pa de dag thams
cad matho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur re zhin/ de ci btsun pas lus kyis sbyin pa sbyong ngam/ 'on te sems kyis sbyin pa sbyong/ gal te lus kyis sbyong na/ lus na bems po
g.yo ba ma mchis pa/ byed pa ma mchis pa ste/ rtswa dang/ shing dang/ rtsig pa'i chos lta bu mig yor dang mtshungs bas/ des kyang sbyong bar mi nus so// ci ste
soms kyis sbyong na/ sems ni sgyu ma lta bu gnas pa ma mas pa ste/ das kyang sbyong bar ma nus so// ci ste lus dang sems kyi phyi ril gyis sbyong na/ de ni ma mchis pa
sta/ ma mchis pas ji ltar sbyong bar bgyid/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po'ang cang mi smra bar gyur to// rab 'byor gyis smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungasachen po bu
[p]/ mos dris ba'i lan thob cig/ 'od srungs chen pos sbas pa/ bu mo ni len pa me 'di'i/ bu mos ne 'dun pa med pa dus shing/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dubs/ de ni lan gdab
par mi nus so// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ gnas brtanarab 'byor la 'di skadacas sbas so// 'di ltar btsun pa ba'abyor ni/ bcom ldan 'das/
kyis rtenamongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa 'a gsan/ cinyon mongs pa med pa de dngos pos rab tu phye ba 'gas sam/ 'on ta tshes nyid kyis rab tu phyab 'gas/
gal te dngos pos rab tu phye ba 'drags na ni 'dus byas su 'gyur ro// ji ste chos nyid kyis rab tu phye ba lags na/ chos nyid ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ 'gag pa ma
mchis pa'i mtshan nyid de/ skye ba ma mchis pa dang 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid gang lags pa de ni mnyam ba nyid de// mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid
gang lags pa de ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'o// 'gyur ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni tha snyad ma mchis pa'o// tha snyad ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab
pa'o// bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang lags pa de na bstan du ma mchis pa'o// bstan du ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// dngos po ma mchis
@#// pagang lags ba de ni ma byud ba'o// ma byung ba gang lags pa de na 'phags pa rnams mi ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor cad mi sna bar gyur to/
de nas tshe dang ldan pa nam grus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smas so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bu mos dris pas lan thob cig/ rab
khyer gyis sbas pa/ 'di la brjod du rtse yod med// cad mi sa ba bde 'beb byed// spros pa med pa'i chos 'di dag/ bu mo yongs su 'dri bar byed// ji srid dngos po skya
yod pa// de srid skyon gyis gos par 'gyur// chos kyi dbyings ni tha snyad med// 'di ni nyon mongs med pa'i tshul// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas// tsho
dang ldan panam gul 'di skad ces sbas so// tshe dang ldan pa nam kun/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci sams la gnas te
bsam gtan mdzad dam/ 'on te sems ma mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad/ gal te sems la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad na/ sems ni brjod du ma mchis shing
skya ma lta bu ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun btags ba lags na/ ci yang dag pa ma yin pa kun btags pa ma mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad/ jis sems m
mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad na ni/ rtsa dang/ shing dang/ rtsig pa dang/ rdo lasogs pa byung ba dang/ zhigang de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ro// de/
ci'i slad du zhenA/ 'di ltar de dgan mas ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// tshe dang ldan pa nam rgu 'ad cad mi sna bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/ tshe dang ldan
ba nam khru la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rnam grubu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ nam rgyus smras pa/ bu mo ni de bzhin bshegs pa'i yul yongs su 'dra ste/
de ni nyan thos rnams kyis bstan par ma nus so// bu mos sas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nam gru chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'ang gzhan la/ nyan thos rnams kyi
rang gzhan lags sam/ gal te chos kyi dbyings gzhan legs na ni tha dad du 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyid ni gnyis su ma mchis te/ de bas na de bzhin nyid dang gnyis ni bye brag
ma mchis na/ ci'i slad du tshodang ldan pa nam gru de skad gsung/ nam gru'ad cang mi sna bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin bas/ tshe dang ldan pa ma
'gags pa la 'di skad ru sbas so// 'di ltar tsho dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa no/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i mig can rnams kyi mchogatu bstan pa lags na/ ci lha'i mig gis/
dngos po gzigs sam/ 'on te dngos po ma mchis pa gzigs/ gal te dngos po gzigs nani rtag par lta bar 'gyur ro// ji sa dngos po ma mchis pa
gzigs nanichad par lta bar 'gyur te/ de'ang mi rigs so// ma 'gags pabang cang mi sna bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas 'di
skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pam 'gags pa bumos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa/ bu mos ni shes rab kun tu 'dzem pa dris pas/ de ni lan
gdab par mi nus so// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod ni/ ba com
ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ mang du thos pa nyid de don du blta 'ag/ 'an tu tshig 'bru khalta/ gal te don du balhan/ den ni brjod du ma
'ches shing bsnyad du ma mchis pa ste/ de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes bas shes par bgyi ba ma lags panas/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis shes par bgyi ba ma 'gas pa lta/
rnam pa de lta bu gang lags pa de ni bstan du ma mchis pa'o// ci ste tshig 'brur blta nani/ bcom ldan 'das kyis don la rten pa yin gyi/ gi 'bu rten pa ma yin no zhes
tsa/ gsungs pas/ de bsan tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i mang du thos pa nyid ni ston pa ma'ags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dag 'ba'ang cang mi sla bar gyur to denas 'jam dpal
gzhen nur gyur pas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ kun dga' bso pas pa/ bumo ni yig dang
bral ba bde ste/ da ni sgras tshim par byed par mi nus go/ bu mo ni sems dang bral ba'i mnyam pa nyid 'di ste/ slob pa rnams kyi sa ga yin na ji ltar bstan par bya ste/ chos kyi
mnga' bdagudo bzhin gshegs pa la zhu dgos so// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dbal
khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pas blabam la mos pa'i byang chub sems dang ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bab pas khyed zab pa 'am/ 'on
tango bo nyid zab pas zab/ gal te rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab pas khyod zab na ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i chos gang yang ma mchis so/ da ci'i slad
du zhu na/ 'di ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni song ba ma lags/ 'ong ba ma lags te/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bani mig gi rnam par shes pas zhes par bgyi ba ma lag
panas/ padakyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyisashes par bgyi bam gas shing/ gnyis su ma mchis la/ kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// jig ngob/
nyid zab pas zab nani/ ngo bo khyod gang yang sus kyang brtag par mi nus so// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ bu mo yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pas kho bo thab go/ bu mo dri ma med
kyis byin pas smras pa/ 'jam dpal yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mtha' ma lags te/ de'i slad du rnam par shes pas 'tshal bam lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa//
! bu mo yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni dmigs su med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa 'jam dbal dmigs su ma mnyis pa ni gang gi tshogi zla
dgas kyang ma lags/ dmigs su ma mchis pa ni tshig bla dgas las yang dag par 'das pa gsaso// 'jam dpal kyis sbas pa/ bu mo 'di ji ltar gzhan dag la bstan par
rgyu bya bumos sas pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byung chub ni bstan pa 'dus yang dag par 'das pa lags te/ de ni brjod pas bstan par mi nus so// 'jam dpal ni
yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di skad du/
ci nas kyang grong khyer 'di na skyes pa'i m/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs/
mthong bar 'gyur b rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/ zhes gsungs pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi sku mthong bar mdzad dam/ 'on te chos kyi skur mthong/
bar mdzad/ gal te gzugs kyi skur mthong bar mdzad na/ da ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni 'di skad du/ gang dag nga la gzugs su
mthong// gang dag nga la sgrar shes pa// 'dun pa 'dod chags ldan pa ste// skye bo de dag nga mi mthong// zhes gsungs so// ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi skur mthong bar
mdzad na/ chos kyi skun bstan du ma nus pa 'o// de ci'i slad du zhi na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni mig gi rnam par shes pa las yang dag par 'das pa ste
blta bar mi nus pa'i slad du'o// mthong ba don yod kyang cang mi sna bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' ni kho re rtag gis smras pa/ mthong ba don yod bu mos dris pas lan thob
cig/ mthong ba don yod kyis skyas pa/ bu mo ni dngos po med pa 'dra ste/ de ni bstan par nus so// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin bas smras pa/ bdag ni das bo rag/ dngos po//
mkhas ba mi 'a'o// bstan pa slobs la de nas ston cig/ mthong ba don yod kyang cang mi smabar gyur to/ de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin bas//
byang chub sems dpa' rin boche tog la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyodakyis 'di skad du/ gang gis grong khyer na khyim thams cad du na bo tshos gang ba'i gtor rnams 'byung
bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bas bsam par bya'o/ zhes gsungs pa de ci bang zing dang bcas pas phan 'dogs pa ma dzad dam/ 'on te zang zang ma mchis pas
phan 'dogs pa mdzad/ kal te zang zing dang bcas pas phan 'dogs na ni/ byas pa so so'i skya bo'i phan 'dogs pa dang bye brag ma mchis par 'gyur go/ de ci'i slad
ts+tsaM du'an/ 'di ltar byas pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi dga' bani zang zing dang bcas pa'i slad du'o// ci ste zang zing ma mchis pas phan 'dogasab mdzad na/ zang zing na
mchis pa ni bsgrub tu ma mchis pa lags so/ rin po che tog kyang rung mi sna bar gyur to// de nas bu mo de ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub sems dbar na
song sbyong la 'di skad cesalcas so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skadadu/ gang gis grong khyer 'di na sems can rnams kyi las ngan songamyong bar 'gyur ba gang yod ba de tsho 'di
nyid la yang zhing chung ngu skyong bar gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pas las ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du bstan
te/ de ni khyod kyis bsam par mi spyod do// gal te spyod na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// ji ste bsam par mi spyod na/ mi mkhyen bzhin du mang po myong/
bar gyur ba'i las tshodi nyid yang zhing chung du myong bar ji ltar mdzad de/ bdag bo ma marmis pa'i chos rnams la bdag po red par gyur ro// gal te de ltar mdzad na de bzhin gshegs
pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// ngan song stong gis smras pa/ kho bo ni smon lam gyi dbang gyis mang du myong bar 'gyur ba'i las nyung du myong bar 'gyur bar byed do// bu mos smras
ba/ rigs kyis bu chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni smon lam gyi dbang gis bskya ra du mi nus lags so// gal te nus par gyur na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o zhes M/
de bzhin gshegs pa re'i dgongs pa re/ smon lam gyi dbang gis ji ltor mi 'grub ste/ rnam grangs 'dis na smon lamakyi dbang gyis bsgyur bar minus par rig par 'o ngan song
spong yang cang mi sna bar gyur to/ de nas bumo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub sems dbang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces sas so//
rigs kyi bu khyod 'disad du/ gang gis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por skya bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgrib palnga po dga rnam par selabar 'gyur ba rnam ba de lta buraM
bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ci ting nge 'dzin de bdag la rag las pa 'gas sam/ 'on te gzhan la rag las pa lags/ gal te bdagal rag las
lags na ni/ mi 'pho ba'i chos can lags te/ ji ltar khyod snyoms par zhugs pas gzhan dag gi sgrib pa rnams rab tu zhi bar mdzad/ ci ste gzhan la rag las pa lags
tshonani/ ting nge 'dzan de khyod kyi ma 'a/gsaso// gang khyod kyi ma lags pa des ni gzhan la phan par mdzad par mi spyod do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sal bas
snyas pa/ bu mo kho bo'i sbyor ba 'di ni byan sa pa sngon du 'a gro ba'o// bumo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang
byams pa la gnas pa 'dwags na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na sems can rnams la sgrib pa rnams kyis gnod pa'i ng mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam
bar sel ba 'od cang mi sna bar gyur to/ de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces sus so//
rigs kyi bu khyodakyis ba de skad du/ cinas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag bcings pa dang gsad par bkri ba de dag thar pa dang/ 'jigs pas nayen pa rnams kyang 'jigs pa
med pa thob par 'gyur b rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa bo des bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de/ ci khyod kyi sbyor ba 'di yin pa dang bcas pa 'kha/ sa sam/ bon te 'dren pa ma mchis pa
gas/ kal te sbyor bde 'dun pa dang bcas pa lags na ni/ byas pa so so'i skabo rnams kyang 'don pa dang bcas pa lags te/ byis pa so so'i skya bo rnams dang mtshungs par
'gyur ro// de lta bas na de'ang mi rigs so// ji sa sbyor ba de len pa ma mchis par lags na ni/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa 'gas te/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa la ni nyakur bsgrub
ba ma mchis so// byang chub sems dang 'a spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i
sbyan ras brigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis su/
ba/ bu mo ni skye ba dang 'gag pa mi 'dra ste/ de ni lan kadab par mi nus so/ bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ spyan ras gabrigs dbang phyug gang na skye yam kar dang
[g]// 'gagapa ma mchis pa de ni dri ba ma mchis pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis snasapa/ bumo gangan skye bamed cing 'gag pa med pa/
de na yi ge 'jug pa med do// bu mos sus pa/ 'jug pa ma mchis pa dang/ ya ge ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la ni mkhas pa dag gi dang 'jug pa mi ston te/ yi ge
rnams la mi chags so// chags pa ma mchis pa ni chos kyi dbyings te/ de la ni rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du chags pa ma marmis so/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyugakyang rung mi sla bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas// byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa btsugs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs
kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du/ gang gis grong khyer na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phan tshun du tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs dang/ byams pa'i sems kyis sna bar 'gyur ba dang/
phyobs pa'i ng thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// zhes gsungs pa'i khyod kyi spobs pa nye bar bsgrub pa gang lags pa de ci rnam par rtog pas
bskyed pa'i gas sam/ 'on targyum mchis pa las byung ba gas/ gal te rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa 'gas nani/ 'dus byas thams cad kyang rnam par rtog pas
[2 ]bskyod pa lags te/ de lta bas na rnam par zhi bar mi 'gyur ro// ci ste rgyu ma mchis pa lasu byung ba 'gas na ni/ ma byung bal sgro 'dogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'/
spobs pa btsugs kyis sbas pa/ bu mo sems can gang dag kho ba mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad spobs pa thob pa gyuracig/ ces bya ba'i kho bo'i smon
lam 'di ni dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste btab bo// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sems bskyed pa gang gis smon lam btab pa'i sems bskyed
pa de mchis sam/ 'on tem mchis/ gal te mchis nani rtag par lta ba lags so// ci ste ma mchis na chad par lta ba lags te/ de gsungs nani khyod kyi gsung ba log pa
lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spobasapa brtsegs kyang rung mis bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' mo pa 'dor
bdon yod la 'di skad kyis sbas so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du/ ci nas kyang grong khyer nasems can gang dag kho lomig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thums cad bla na med pa yod/
dag par rdo gas pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur b rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/ zhes gsungs pa de ci byang chub de mchis pa zhes brjod par bgyi 'am/
ka@#// 'on tem mchis pa zhes brjod par bgyi/ gal te mchis na nicug ste/ yod pa'i mthar 'dzan pa 21gas so// ci ste ma mchis na ni chad paste/ med pa'i mthar
'dzani b.lags so// byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod kyis smas pa/ bumo byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas sa
pa/ ci la shes de skye bas rab tu bya ba lags s// 'on te zhi bas rab tu phye ba lags/ gal te skye bas rab tu phye ba'ags nani tshul bzhin ma 21gas pa yid labgyid pa las byung ba
'dus byas su 'gyur te/ shes pa de ni byis pa rnams kyi lags so// ci ste zhi bas rab tu phyu ba lags na ni de la dmigs pa ma mchis so// gang la dmid pa ma mchis pa de
la 'di ni so so'i skya bo 'o zhi 'am/ nyan thos so zhe nam/ rang sangs rgyas so zhi 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ozhi ma/ sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par rtog pa mi skya'o// de
ci'i slad du zhen/ byang chub ni rnam par mi rtog pa lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni byang chub la rnam bgartog sta/ mkhas pa rnams ni mi rtog pa'i slad du'o// byang
chub sems dpa' gom pa'i dor ba don yod kyang cang mi smabar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//
bsod snyomasakyi phyir grong khyer du 'jug par mi bya'i sur ba dang ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dang bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa las chos thos pa gang yin pa de ni mkhas pa'i bras yin pas chog/
par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ chos kyi bsababra' bar bya'o// de nas bu cho dri ma med kyis byin pas/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces sbas so// btsun pa ba 'byor gang na/
gdeg pa med pa dang/ gzhag ba med pa de la khyod kyis ci zhig btsal bar sems// btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong gi tshul ni spros pa ma mchis pa lags kyi/ sngos pa dag
ba ni ma lags so// btsun pa rab 'byed dge sbyong gi chos ni gnas pa ma mchis pa/ gnas par mi bgyi ba lags te/ 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yu ni mi 'khrugs pa' gas so//
bam po gnyis pa ste thama'o// de nas nyan thos chen po brgyad po de dag dang/ byang chub sems dang ba brgyad po de dag dang/ bram
ze lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang/ bumo dri ma med kyis byin pa dang/ rgyal pogasal rgyal dang/ de las gzhan pa skya bo phal po che rnams/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin
nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyisabyin pA
bcom ldan 'das lan stong bskor babyas te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal/
bde legs su thalamo sbyar ba btud nas/ gas su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ ting 'a dzin stobs ldan grags pa mtha' yas ma'// 'jig rten mgon po bdud rtsi dka'
stsol ba// gtsus mid shes bde gshegs khyod la zhu// byang chub sems dpa'i ji ltar spyad pa spyod// ji ltar shing dbang drung bzhugs bdud rnams 'joms// ji ltar ra
ban sa rnams g.yo bar bgyid// grags pa mtha' yas ji ltar 'od zer gtong// byang chub spyodatshul ba'ags par bshad du gsol// sangs rgyas nor gyi gzungs ni ji ra
'thob// ting 'dzin zhi ba dam pa ji ltar sgom// mi yis rdzu 'phrul stobs ni ji ltar 'thob// sems can rin chen rnams kyi spyod pa gsungs// gang gis dran dang rtogs dang blo gros
'gyur// spobs pa mdzes dang ldan par gang gis 'gyur// gang dang rab tu ldan na 'khong nang du// snyan cing shin tu mdzes ba snabar bgyid// gang gis mi ni tshe rabs dran par 'khyur/
dri ma ma mchis lha yi mig kyang 'thob// lhan 'thob cing pha rol sems tshul ga/ rdzu 'phrul gyis ni zhing rnams brgyar yang ma/ ji ltar sbyin pa katong la brtson par 'gyur//
rtag tu tshul khrims dag cing bzod la dga'// jiltar brtson 'grus bsam gtan mkhas par 'gyur// shes rab yang ji ltar pashin tubatson// mngal gyi gnas na ji ltar rnam
spangs nas// pad+ma las ni rtag tu smras te skye// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar mchis par bgyid// bdag mad stong pa nyid kyi sgra yang brjod// ji ltar de yid dga' dang mi
dka' mtshungs// srid pa sngangs shing thu ba zhe sdang stong// mtho bar ma soms dma' bar soms mamachis// sems brtan g.yo ba ma mchis rab mtshungs// rnyed dang ma
rnyed grags dang ma grags dang/ bstod dang smad dang bad dang sdug bsngal dang// ji ltar 'jige rtenAtshosa rnams bril mnan gnas// 'jig rten kun la zla ba lta bur spyod/ nga
yi ma mchisatshul 'chos g.yo ma mchis// ji ltar rdul bral ngaskyel rgyags pa slong// zhi dang rab tu zhi dang zhi gnas brtson// blo ldan ji ltar yu shes mchog tu 'gyur// chung ma
bunor mdza' la dga' ma mchis// ji ltar bas mtha'i 'a la mngon par dga'// rtag tu bya dang mtshungs shing zla ba 'dra// ji ltar chos kyi ne'o la dga' zhing mos// chu
dang mtshungs shing sa 'odra rlung dang mtshungs// mkhas pa ji ltar ma dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rtag tu ci yang ma mchis mitog lags// mnyam pa nyid la dga' zhing nam mkha'
mtshungs// ji ltar rtag tu chos ni spong mi bgyid// bdag 'dor bgyid kyi chos mchog yongami gtong// 'jig rten dag tu ston pa'i sems bskyed nas// ji/
[A ]ltar gnas te byang chub 'jug bar bgyid// zhing gi bkod pa ji ltar gnas bar 'gyur// dge 'dun dag par ji ltar 'gyur ba lags// ji ltar dus gsum du yang chos klos gang/
ji ltar tshe ring sems can bde bar 'gyur// ga dusred pa 'gog pa'i pha rol son// dgra bcom 'dul bar bden bzhi ji ltar mthong// sems can brgya dag byang chub 'dzeg bgyid
par/ spyod cing rtag tu dga' mos ji ltar 'gyur// gang gis shin tu mdzes par 'gyur/ rdzus te skya bar gang gis 'gyur// longs spyod che dang shes rab che/ kun mkhyen
rtogs par khong du chud// gang gis sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// dpe byad bzang bo brgyad cu thob// bsod nams kun la mkhas pa kas// spobs pa gang gis skye bar 'gyur//
zhingani ji ltar dag 'gyur lags// dge slong dge 'dun phun sum tshogs// gang du de yisasmon btab pa// de ni ji ltar skya 'gyur lags// tshe bas dran par ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar
sangs rgyas rnams dang mjal// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// ngan 'akor mchi bar mi 'gyur lags// rnam par 'dren paji ltar na// mdog dngagabri brjid snyan grags 'thob//
[s/ ]stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus rnams// ji ltar thub par mi 'gyur gas// ji ltar sangs rgyas chos dang yang// dge 'dun la ni skyabs su mchis// lus dang srog ni gtong baspyod
kyi de dag chos ni 'dor mi bgyid// byang chub spyad pa spyod bgyid cing// the tshom ma mchis ji ltar 'gyur// 'gyod pa thams cad sangs nas su// srog chags rnams la chos kyang ston//
khyod la me mkhyen cang mi mnga'// thub chen khyod ni thams cad mkhyen/ byang chub sems dang 'ispyod gang 'dugs// go rims bzhin du bstan du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa 23 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo legs so 'dzugs so/ bumo de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di lta bu 'dri bar//
sems pani khyod yang 'degs so// bu mo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// bumo drin chad kyis byin bas bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol to/
bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud 'dul bar byed de/ bzhi
gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog med pa dang/ phra ma'i tshig yongs su slong ba dang/ skya bo mang po dge ba'i rtsa ba brten du 'jug pa dang/ sgrib pa med pa'i byams/
pa sgom pa ste/ bumo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bdud 'dul bar byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste phrag dog mi bya phram snyami bu//
skya bomang po dag bsnams la sbyar// phyogs bcu rnams su byams pa bsgom byas n bdud 'dir btul nas byang chub reg par 'gyur/ pa 'bu mo byang chub sems dpa'
tshos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa dag g.yo bar byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ji skadasna ba de bzhin byed pa dang/ chos brab mo la mos pa dang/ yi dam la
brtan pa dang/ skye bo'ang bo byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ba ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthun lus pa dag g.yo bar
byed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ji skadas pa de bzhin byed/ mkhas pa brab mo'i chos la bzod/ yi dam la yang shin tu brtan// dkar po'i chos la 'dzud par byed// rdzogs
pa'i byang chub bla med la// skye bo mang po dga' bar byed// de ltar chos bzhi de dag gis// zhing rnams bye ba g.yo bar byed// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan n
sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'od zer dag gtong// bzhi gang zhen/ mar ma sbyin pa dang/ dam pa'i chos yo+ongs su 'dzin pa dang/ sems can bag
med par gyur cing mi khom par gyurapa rnams kyi gan du song ste chos ston pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod can dag la rin po che'i dra bas 'gebs pa ste/ bumo byang chub sems dpa'/
tshes bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'od zer dag gtong ngo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste maram byin pas 'od ni rnam par 'dag/
zad ba'i dus na dam chos longs su 'dzin// bag med gyur pa rnams la chos sbyin byed// mchod rten dag larin chen dri ba 'bul// des na bye ba mtha' yas zhing 'gro zhing// byang chub semA
dpa' 'od zer gtong bar byed// reg nas sems can bde dang ldan par 'gyur// mkhas pa byang chub bla med don du gnyer// bumo byang chub sems dba' chos bzhi dang ldan
na/ gzungs 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgyan sna tshogs ba gtsang zhing dag pa sbyin pa dang/ bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te 'dod pa rnams la sbyin pa dang rgyun mi
'chad par de bzhin gshags pa'i bsngags pa rjod pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mad du gnas pa ste/ bumo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzungs
'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sna tshogs byin pas gzungs ni thob par 'gyur/ slong ba rnams la bu mo brgyan te sbyin/ rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas bsngags pa
rjod// rgyal ba'i ye shes don du shes rab sgom// chos bzhi 'di dag gis ni gzungs thob 'gyur// bskal pa brgyar yang thos po chud me bu/ phyogs
bcur de bzhin gshegs pa gang 'chadapa// de dag thams cad dran pa'i stobs kyis 'dzan// bumo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ ting nge 'dzin 'thob
ste de bzhi ba dang zhen/ 'khor ba la yid byung bamang ba dang/ gcig pur kun tu dga' zhing mgu la mos pa dang/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang/ las kyi mtha' shin tu
yongs su mthar phyin pa yin te/ bumo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dgadang ldan na/ ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa// de la 'di skad ces bya/ srid pa'i 'gro ba kun la yid
kyang byung/ 'bas pa lta bur gcig pur spyod la dga'// rtag tu shin tu brtson 'grus brtsamasapa yin// de'i las rtag tu shin tu mthar yang phyin// ga tu chos bzhi dag la zhugs
nasasu// byang chub spyod pa zhi bamyur 'tshol byed// byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzinaM kor ba thob/ rgyal ba rnams kyi spyod yul byang chub rtogs// bu mo byang chub sems
ts+tso dpa'i chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rdzu 'phrul 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yang ba dang/ sems yang ba dang/ chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa dang/ 'aman
bzhi nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa nyid byin gyis rlob ba ste/ bumo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dgadang ldan na/ rdzu 'phrul 'thob bo// de la 'disad ces bya sta/ lus
ya nga ba dang sems kyang de bzhin yang// chos rnams kun la gnas pa med pa nyid/ nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs shing 'dra nyid du// khams bzhi po dag byin kyis rlob par byed/ chos
bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na// blo ldan de yis rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas thob// skad cig gcig zhing rnams stong du bgro/ sasargyas stong phrag mang po rnams kyang mthong/
bumo byang chub sems dba' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mdzes par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na khrob mad de/ rtsod pa dang/ tha ba dang/ zhe sdang dang bral ba dang/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'imachod rten ba thug par mngon par dgar ba dang/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pas bsdam sa shing/ tshur shog legs par 'ongs so zhes rtag tu snab dang/ chos smra ba
rnams la khro gnyer dang bral zhing zhe 'gras pa'isoms med pa yin te/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ mdzes par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
gzhan la khro dang khon du 'dzin mi byed// nga rgyal rgyags dang tha ba zhe sdang bral// rtsod pa med la dga' zhing snyan par smra/ gas par rgyal ba'i mchod rten 'phyug par byed// de ni tshul khrims
rnam dag rtag tusrang// de ni rtag tu legs par 'ongs zhes smra// chos rnams la de ni tha ba med// de ye samasani rdo rje ri rab mtshungs/
byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa byed du 'jug pa dang/ me tog
ut+pa la dang/ pad+madang/ pad+ma dkar po dag gis lag pa bkang ste de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshags pa'i mtshod rten la mngon par 'thor ba dang/ phan pa'i dngos
pomang zhing yang dgapar dga' bar byed pa'i ngang tshul can dang/ gzhan dag gi skyon me 'dzin pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad de man na thams cad 'a phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir
sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu yongasasu sdobar byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhipo de dag dang ldan na/ rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs

byed// de na dngos po kun la rtag tu 'dzin pa med// rgyal ba'i ye shes mchog la mos pa bskyed byas na// de na spyir zhing longs spyod chen po batheb par 'gyur/ @#/ dad dang ldan par
'gyur zhing g.yo med sgyu yang med// pha rol dag gi skyon ni 'dzan par yong mi byed// lhag pa'i bsam pas gang gis lta ba drang gyur pa// des na de 'dir longs spyod bzang po rnams
dang ldan tsa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan no/ shes rab chen por 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhin/ chos la ser sna mi byed pa dang/ mi
mthun par mi 'jug pas 'gyod pa sel ba dang/ gsol ba 'debs pa la yang dag pa jilta ba bzhin du gdams ngag ston pa dang/ stong pa nyid sgom pa la mang du gnas pa ste/

bas bzhed pa'i byang chub sgyur du 'thob// sangs rgyas rjes su bstanal bslabs byas nas// rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas dgyur ro// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos

bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtan gyi khamasan 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ chos kyang ston pad dag thams cad baslus par gyur cig/ de nas tshe/
dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bu mo dragled kyis byin bal 'ad skad ces smras so// bum khyod 'di skad sna banangomatshar te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byung tshul legs

gsug bya stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'da rnam pa drug tugayos bar gyur cig/ sems can gang la'ang gnod pa med pa gyur tsag/ bdun pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis
bcom ldan 'das kyis rdaltar b tags pa'i chos 'di dag la nga dag par blangs te gnas par 'gyur zhen/ bden pa dang bden pa' tshig des lha'i me tog gi char mngon par bab par gyur
cig ma dkrolabar sali snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong sgra 'byin par gyur cig/ bdag kyang bumod kya lus la sa rgyurata/ rgyas pa'i lus su 'od cing/ lo bcu drug len pa 'dra bar

phyogs bcu rnams su mdzes// khyod kyi snyan mtshams bar gyi mdzod sdu rab mdzes dkar zhing dri ma mamachis bzang// 'bar zhing pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung dang ma tog kun da 'dra bas phyogs
gsal bgyad// thams cad mog mog bgyis nas gdugs kyis srin bu ma khyer bzhin du rgyal ba mdzes// mi yi seng ge thub 'di gang gi don chen bzang por deng gyur bstan du gsol//
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di byin gyis brlab/
gang gis bud med kyi dngos po gyur te/ rgyas pa 'i dbang po thob par gyur pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub semag
rang la dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag brgyad cur bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir srad de/ bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag drug cur spyod
nas phyis bu mo 'di 'jam der 'ab gzhon nus gyur pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sams bskyed do// 'jamo dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyi 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i byang chub sems
dpa' brgyad khri dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa de 'dra ba dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dri mchod kyis byin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gcig tu
'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chon pos/ byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces sbas so// rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar yun
ring du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir sbyod skyedun/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis de'i tsho bud modakyi dngos po ma bsgyur/ byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pas sus
pa/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin na/ btsun pa khyod ci'i phyir skyes pa'i lus las mi bskyor/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen
pa cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po dri ma med kyis byin pas/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal kyi bu
chen po bud med kyi lus kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang ma yin/ skyes pa'i lus kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
byang chub ni ma skyes pa ste/ de ni lus sam sems kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sams
dpa' 'jam dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' drimamed kyis byin pa 'di zab mo la mos pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'am dngal 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' drim med kyis byin pa 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu'i thadan tshangs par spyod paspyad do// stod pa ti/
tshe/kyi tid de 'dzin bsgomasaso// bskal pa brgyad cur a skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa bsgomasaso// sangs rgyase ba phraka sumacu dad/ byang chub sems dpa' zabamo'i tshul dang ldan pa rnams
la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su d+his so// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu lan bza' dang zhal zas kyis bkur stir byas so// spobs pa rnam par nges pa bstan pa'i
