yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ lam bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang 'di rtag pa dang/ chad pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i lta ba bsgom pa dang/ 'dod pa dang/ gnod sems dang/

rnam par 'tsho ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa bsgom pa dang// bdag dang gzhan la gdung ba med pa'i yang dag pa'i ngag bsgom pa dang/ tshul 'chos pa dang/ kha gsag dang/ gzhog

slongs dang/ thob kyis 'jal ba dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba bsgom pa dang/ lus dang sems nyam chung ba dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i las kyamatha' bsgom pa dang/ bdag la bstod pa dang gzhan la

smadu pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i rtsol ba bsgom pa dang/ gti mug dang rmongs pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i dran pa bsgom pa dang/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i ting de
'dzin bsgom pa sta/ 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa zhes bya'o// des na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub dang/ de las gzhan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang

[po, ]yayin pa dag kyang bag yod pas thob ces bya'o// grogs po dag de ltar n bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sumacu rtsa bdun po 'di dag la 'jug go/ zhugs nas 'du byed thams
cad kyi 'dam las rgal lo// brgal nas kyang rnam par lta ste/ rnam par bltasan ma mthong ngo// mi 'bar ro// shin tu nye bar zhi ba ste/ rnam par 'khrug par ma byed do// shin tu nye bar
zhi kha gang zhe na/ gang nye bar ma bsgrubs pa de ma byas pa'o// gang ma byas pa de myong ba med pa'o// gang myong ba med pa de la gdags pa med do// gang gdags pa med pa de shin tu nye
bar zhi ba'o// bstan ba 'di bshad po na/ lha'i bu khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dra ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ lha'i bu dang 'bazangs kyis/
gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhonanur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dang 'a lam ji ltar sgom/ smas pa// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'a rer ba'ang mi
spong la/ 'khor ba'i nyes ba rnams kyis kyang ma gos so// 'dus ma byas su'ang ma lcong la/ 'dus ma byas kyi yon tan rnams kyang myong ngo// pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam yang sgom
la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di'ang snang ngo// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi laman stong pa nyid kyi rnam par dag pa'i ng yin la// lta bar gyur pa la'angamakhas
shang / lta ba gyur pa 'a mngon nga la zhen pa 'ang med do/ mtshan ma chad nga sa rnamakha' dag pa' nga yin la// mtshan ma la 'a ngamakhas shing/ mtshan ma la mngon par
[+ ]zhen pa 'ang med do// snon pa med pas rnam par dag pa'i ng yin la/ khams gsum pa la'ang mkhas shing/ khams gsum ba la mngon par zhen pa'i ng med do// skya ba med pa dang 'byung ba med pas rnam/

sgyu par dag pa'i nga yang de la/ skye ba dang 'jig pa la'ang mkhas shing/ skye ba dang 'jig pa la mngon par zhen pa'i ng yod do// de ci'i phyire zhin/ byang chub sems dpa' thams nges par sems pa rnams na sos

can chos thams cad stong pa'o snyam pa'i lta bar gyur par zhugs pa/ lta bar gyur pa bag la nyal bar byas pa rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa spang pa'i phyir chos kyang ston la/lta bar gyur pa de dag kyang stong ba nyid

du mthong ngo// de bzhin du sbyar ti/ byang chub sems dpa' sems nges par sams pa ni mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang/ skye ba med pa dang/ 'byung ba med pa'i

a thams cad la 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i rjes su la thun pa// 'byung ba dang 'jig pa bag la nyal bar byas pa rnams kyi 'byung ba dang 'jig par lta ba spang ba'i phyir chos kyang ston la/ 'byung ba dang 'dzag pa de'ang
'byung ba dang 'jig pa med pa nyid du mthong ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bsgom pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam na 'gro ba dang 'ong ba

zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ban sogs can gyi bsam ba rnams la'o// 'ong ba ni so so ci rigs par chos ston pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dang 'a 'gro ba na snyoms par 'jug pa bskyang pa'i phyi ro/

'or ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can gyi nang du skye ba'i phyir ro// khyad chub sems pa'i 'gro ba ni 'phags pa'i lam du'o// 'ong ba ni 'phags pa ma yin ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro/ 'gro ba mi

rgyu ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'ong ba ni bzod pa de gnas can gyis khong du chud par byed pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ban 'byung ba la mkhas pa la'o// 'ong ba ni 'byung ba ma yin par

'byung ba'i phyir ro// ra rtsub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i phyir ro// 'ong pa na 'khor ba nasoms can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'gro ba ni gang du'ang 'gro ba dang

'ong ba med par so sor rtog pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ong ba na chos khong du chud par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'gro ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon
pa med pa bsgom pa'i phyir ro// 'ong ba rnam par rtog pa gsum spang bar chos ston pa'i phyir/ 'gro ba ni dam bcas pa brtan par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'ong ba ni dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par

byed pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba byang chub kyi snying bor 'gro ba'i phyir ro/ byang chub sams dpa'i 'ong ba ni byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i phyir te/ lha'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi lam 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bya ba'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya mi skya ba'achos la bzod pa skyes so/// de nas lha'i bu dpal bzos
kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od ces bgyi ba zhig thos na/ 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams
cad kyi 'od de phyogs gang na mchis/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ji skad ces bgyi ba zhig chos ston/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu stong gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/

ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bya ma snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od kyis bya ba yod// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcol ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba chos ston to// snyas 'a 'jam dpal bdag gas 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs snyan s
rgyas kun tu bzang po de blta bar bgyi'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ de'i tshe dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur

gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu lus las de dang 'thun pa'i 'od byung sta/ 'od dus sas rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyad po de dag par bar byas nas// 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de'ang snang ba

[4]]chen pos khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po pa'i sas rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes pa de dag gis 'od de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te thal mo sbyar nas bcom

ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das 'od 'di ltar yongs su dag pa 'di gang nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das rig bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing da skyes/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung bcu gnas kyi bye ma snying

'das la na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// 'tsho'o// gzhes so// chos kyang ston to// de na

phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba zhes bya ba dril mad ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs rta/ do'i lus kyi 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing skad grungs
mad pa dag snang ba chen pos khyab bo// des 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang snang ba chen pos khyab bo// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams ma marjod de dang/ bcom ldan 'das
da bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa blta bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de 'azhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang pos zhabs kyi 'og ga mthil gyi

'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa las 'od zer stong phyung sta/ 'od zer de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyad las 'das to/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/
zhi/ @#// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'ad mthong zhing/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'a sangs rgyas shAkya

thub pa dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyang mthong ngo// byang chub sams dpa' 'di dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od d mthong zhing/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po rdo dang/ byang chub soms pa' de dag kyang mthong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshe gas ba kun tu bzang chos/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rig kyi bu dag der chos kyi gtum chen po 'byung bar 'gyuran/ khyod kyi nang nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'gro bar spro ba
su yod/ byang chub sems dpa' yi shes sgron ma 'dzin ces bya ba dar 'dus par gyur to/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das rdo la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzod der mchi bar spro
lags so// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu da de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yi shes sgron ma 'dzin/ byang chub sems dpa'i
bye ba phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar to// bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ dpar na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas

lag ba bskum pa las bskyang ba dang/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'jam

dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mdun gyi stong gi bar snang la gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs par phyin to// de'i g.yog 'khor de dag kyang khang pa brtsigs pa legs par gnas pa rnams su phyin to// de dag rang rang gi stan las langs nas

thal mo sbyar te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras so// 'jam dpal bdag cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas kun tu bzang po des khyod la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyan bkur bya ba dang/ chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dare btang ngo// khyod kyis 'od bkye ba de'ang 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to// de nas 'dod pa na

spyod pa dang/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ kye ma ja tsam du 'di ltar myur bar 'od zur 'ad 'jagen gyi khams der phyin pa dang/ 'di ltar myur ba byang rlub

sams pa' 'di dag 'jig rten gyi khamasaa mdzad 'dare phyin pa 'dan skyes bu dam pa dedag gis mngon par shes pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dad/ ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes ched du brjod

pa ched du brjod do/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lha'i 'khor chen po de ltar 'dus pa de la ci nas kyang lha khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bsam pa thag pa nas/ bla na yod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[z/ ]@#// byang chub tu sems skyes pa de lta de ltar chos bstan to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ji srid du dga' ldan gyi gnas su lha rnams kyi don bya ba de srid du byas nas// byang chub/

sams dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag dang lhan cig/ nga gi 'khor dang lhan cig/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang lhan cig tu dga' ldan gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur to/
sogs kyis 'gyur ba tsam gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis gnang ste/ phyogs gcig tu rang rang gi bstan la 'khod do// de nas byang chung sams dpa' la shas sgronam 'dzin dang lhan cig lhags pa'i byang chub sams dpa' bya ba phrag bcu bo de dag gis/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal tA/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la/'tshom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang bo gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngom/ spyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du chug/ gang dag par gzengs bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' ban

mdzad do// mang dag par dga' bar mdzad cing/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug la/ yang dag par gas bstod de da yang dag pa rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas kyang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bka' stsal ba/grogs po

dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag dang/ 'jam bal gzhon nur gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin gyi mdon par shes pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang/ byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang/ sems can sdud pa dang/ yongs su

smin par byed ba dang/ thabs dang/ rig sa ba dang/ yi shes dang/ shes rab kyis rab tu dbye ba dang/ spobs pa la ltos/ grogs po dag byang chub sams dpa' 'di dag ni bskal pa graa mad pa nas bzung ste// sangs rgyas kyi mdzad/

pas sems can rnams la zhu bar gnas pa dag go/ sems can gang dag gdabang po drug po dag la skyes bu dam pa 'di deb mngon par 'gyur ba de dag ni phyis bad kyi yug la gnas par m 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya'o/

de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag byang chub sems dpa' la shas sgron ma'adzin dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams ma mdzod 'di'i btsun pa nyi dag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa las chos thos nas/mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin dang lhan cig lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lamago bos phyag 'tshal to/

lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chan po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas mi snang bar gyur la skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams der
denas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal6/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ chos
shag lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gas chos kyi rnam grangs da bzung 'gasan/ 'di'i ming ji skad bgyi
bar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bde bsan khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam dpal gyi le'u dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab babastan ba zhes bya
bar zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalanas/ lha'i bu dpal bzangs dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'a khong dadang/ lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma

sazhi dang/ dri za bcas pa'i khe jig rten ya rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchogabartsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya ba las/ sangs rgyas
kya yul bsam gyis ma khyab ba/ lha'i bu dpal bzangs kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba 'di'u ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so/// rgyagar gyi mkhan po dzan ma tra dang/ dAn shA le dang/ chun bar ma
dang chen gyatshob zhang ye shes sdes bsgyuratsang zhus te gtan la phab pa/ sho ka drug brgya bam po gnyis/ slar yang phyi mo dag ba gsum dpang por byas te dag par zhus//
